Francais: La première année de Cyrus, roi de Perse, pour accomplir la parole de Yahweh, qu'il avait dite par la bouche de Jérémie, Yahweh excita l'esprit de Cyrus, roi de Perse, qui fit faire de vive voix et par écrit cette proclamation dans tout son royaume :
Anglais: Now in the first year of Cyrus king of Persia, that the word of the  Lord  by the mouth of Jeremiah might be fulfilled, the  Lord  stirred up the spirit of Cyrus king of Persia, that he made a proclamation throughout all his kingdom, and put it also in writing, saying,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay busata jewta vi Sirus mulla vi Persiya, kay hob vun yoboyna vi Ma-Vatɗina ma nam dum hay vun Yeremiyasna, Ma-Vatɗina zliy ŋusta vi Sirus mulla vi Persiya kulo'o, nam hin siwelda hiɗi ɗot tam sum sa hay mulda valam kafna ala:
Bulu: Mbu ôsu Sirus njô bôte ya Perse a nga taté jôô, nalé ate ajô Nti a nga jô a anyu Yérémi nkulu mejô da ye tôéban, Nti a nga fôʼô Sirus njô bôte ya Perse nleme ya lôme tyiñ a tili fe kalate éjôé jé ése été na:
Guiziga: Ar vi mudumbuŋ ngi Sirus mazum buy a Perse na, ɓa gwat Bumbulvuŋ miɓa zleˀe ti balam mijiviɗ Zeremi a gi muduba na, Bumbulvuŋ a ca wuluk ani da Sirus, buy Perse, ɓa a til di mi, yo ɓa a toho ti tuh toh toh da mizli ngi si ruwuy naŋhay gar ma.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder nduuɓu Koores, laamiiɗo Persiya, aranu, Jawmiraawo anniyi hebbitingo wolde muuɗum nde o wi'no bee hunnduko annabi Yeremiya, o ummini ɓernde Koores haa o neldi wooynaandu nder laamu maako, bee hunnduko e binndol fuu, wi'ugo :
Fulfulde_DC: Nder nduuɓu Koores, laamiiɗo Persiya, aranu, Jawmiraawo anniyi hebbitingo wolde muuɗum nde o wi'no bee hunnduko annabi Yeremiya, o ummini ɓernde Koores haa o neldi wooynaandu nder laamu maako, bee hunnduko e binndol fuu, wi'ugo :
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sirus ɔɔ so nɛ wan Pɛrsɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ taamɔ ha̧ a̧ mɛ yɔr wen’ɛ tɛ kuti pɛ ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧‘i ha̧ o bíí nù lɛŋ mɛ tɔr, ha̧ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ nú  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ Jeremii mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sirus ɔɔ so nɛ wan Pɛrsɛ, ɓɛɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ taamɔ ha̧ a̧ mɛ yɔr wen’ɛ tɛ kuti pɛ ɔɔ-wan kɔ̧-a̧‘i ha̧ o bíí nù lɛŋ mɛ tɔr, ha̧ wen nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ so nɛ nú  wi-tɔ̧-wen  oi nú Sɔ̧ Jeremii mɛ hɔ gba̧a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwa ghate ta va ta Sirəs, meghea ka Pɛrse mbe meghe ne, pa Mahwətə zəzəte kayipə ghena nya gezeke ŋkɛ laka mɛa nde mɛ ŋkwa Zhɛrɛmi kadzawa. Pa ŋkɛ vame zəzə mbe mehele ta Sirəs kezha zlapete ŋkɛ te hɛɗia ŋkɛ ba'a kezha rafete palepa kala nya:
Tupurri: Ti kiñgi ma tañgu ga Sirus wañ Perse kol ti wañ mono, Manwur raw bag jag waçaçre äe maga se hay waçaçn ne Jermi jag go. Manwur raw buñ ti Sirus wañ Perse go, se raw waçaçge wo go äil sir äen äuy ga 'waa äay de jag lay, yer lay gano:

Francais: "Ainsi dit Cyrus, roi de Perse : Yahweh, le Dieu du ciel, m'a donné tous les royaumes de la terre, et il m'a dit de lui bâtir une maison à Jérusalem, qui est en Juda.
Anglais: Thus saith Cyrus king of Persia, The  Lord  God of heaven hath given me all the kingdoms of the earth; and he hath charged me to build him an house at Jerusalem, which is in Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni ti dita vi Sirus, mulla vi Persiya, Ma-Vatɗina Lawn ma dukalawna vulan mulda ta gaa kay nagatawa kafe, nam vulan lopna kay nan ma inim ziyna hay Yerusalem ta ka hay Yuda.
Bulu: Avale di nde Sirus njô bôte ya Perse a jô na: Nti, Zambe a ne yôp, a veya ma bijôé bise ya si a a veya ma ésaé ya lôñe nye nda e Yérusalém a ne e Yuda.
Guiziga: Sirus, buy Perse, a ɓi ani: «Ya Siruso, zumabuy ngi si ruwuy gar na, Bumbulvuŋ, Buy muŋ, a vuliy di le da ya, yo naŋ ti hirnga naŋ vuna a ɓiy, ɓa i ra ndiraŋ hay a Zeruzalem, hirwuy Zuda.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: “Ndaa nii Koores, laamiiɗo Persiya wi'i: Jawmiraawo Allah mo asama, hokki yam laamuuji duniyaaru fuu. Kaŋko o umri yam mi nyiɓana mo haykaliiru haa Urusaliima nder lesdi Yahuuda .
Fulfulde_DC: “Ndaa nii Koores, laamiiɗo Persiya wi'i: Jawmiraawo Allah mo asama, hokki yam laamuuji duniyaaru fuu. Kaŋko o umri yam mi nyiɓana mo haykaliiru haa Urusaliima nder lesdi Yahuuda .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wen ko Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ yiwese ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-wan zu nù lɛŋ ha̧‘m. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧‘m mbó Tua ha'i sɛn Jerusalɛm, nù Juda.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wen ko Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ nɛ mɔ'ɔ: «GASA WAN Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ yiwese ha̧a̧ mɔɔ-wan zu nù lɛŋ ha̧‘m. A̧ tɔ̧ɔ̧ a̧‘m mbó Tua ha'i sɛn Jerusalɛm, nù Juda.
Kapsiki_DC: «Wa nya ghena nya gezete Sirəs, meghea ka Pɛrse nya: Nahe Shala Mahwətə nya pelɛ ghweme keveyi ka meghe nyi te hɛɗi pɛtɛ mbe dzeve ta ɗa. Nahe ŋkɛ kendeke ɗa hweŋkwa kaŋa nda ghɛ mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm, te hɛɗia Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ fen maga Sirus wañ Perse waçaçn mono: Manwuri, Baa ma ciñn haç wañre ma ti tamsirn wo go ne ndi äuy, day se raw riñ ndi ga ndi mo boo tiñ ne se Jerusalem wo ti prog ma Juda no.

Francais: Qui d'entre vous est de son peuple? Que son Dieu soit avec lui, et qu'il monte à Jérusalem, qui est en Juda, et bâtisse la maison de Yahweh, Dieu d'Israël! C'est le Dieu qui est à Jérusalem.
Anglais: Who is there among you of all his people? his God be with him, and let him go up to Jerusalem, which is in Judah, and build the house of the  Lord  God of Israel, (he is the God,) which is in Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jargi tani sa ma ir vi sumuna valamu mi gige? la ka'a Ma-Vatɗina valamu li hiɗi namu, hinim tuɗ hay Yerusalem  ta ka hay Yuda, kay in ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina, Lawna vi Israyel. Mi Lawna ma ka hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: Za ya be mia a ne môte ya e bôte béé? Zambe wé a tabeʼe e be nye a môt ate a ntoo ve bet e Yérusalém a ne e Yuda a lôñe ndaa Nti e Zambe Israél, e Zambe a ne e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Ko wa gar a wuzla kumo, mubo ti wuzla mizli naŋhay gar na, anja Buymisemuŋ naŋ a ndir ati naŋ, a mi nga Zeruzalem, hirwuy Zuda, nga ndira hay da Bumbulvuŋ Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyele. I Buymisemuŋ misi a Zeruzalem!
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Moy caka mooɗon ɗon nder ummaatoore Allah? Allah wonda bee maako. Sey o yaha Urusaliima nder lesdi Yahuuda, o nyiɓana Allah Jawmiraawo mo Isra'iila teddinta haykaliiru. Kaŋko woni Allah haa Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Moy caka mooɗon ɗon nder ummaatoore Allah? Allah wonda bee maako. Sey o yaha Urusaliima nder lesdi Yahuuda, o nyiɓana Allah Jawmiraawo mo Isra'iila teddinta haykaliiru. Kaŋko woni Allah haa Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN a̧ dúk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ ya nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ si Jerusalɛm nù Juda, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl , Sɔ̧ nɛ duk sɛn Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN a̧ dúk in'nɛ̀ɛ́ lɛŋ nɛ ya nɛ́ dukbíí kɔ̧-a̧. Ɛ̀nɛ̀ dáŋ si Jerusalɛm nù Juda, ɓɛɛ ɛ̀nɛ̀ mbó Tua ko GASA WAN Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl , Sɔ̧ nɛ duk sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Yayata wəndə nya kenza kawəndə ŋkɛ hwa gheyɛ ne, pa Shala ta ŋkɛ nza le, dzeme Zhɛrəzalɛm ŋkɛ te hɛɗia Zhəwda kazhɛne ŋa ghɛa Shala Mahwətə ta ka Israyɛl, gheŋkɛ Shala nya pelɛ Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Wose yoo äay diñ je ma yoo jar äen wo la? Daga Baa äen mo hay de äe day aà mo raw wo Jerusalem maga wo ti prog Juda mono, mo wo boo tiñ mani Manwuri, Baa ma Israyel no. AÀ diñ Baa maga wo Jerusalem mono.

Francais: Qu'à tous ceux qui restent de Juda, en tous les séjours où ils demeurent, les gens de ce séjour viennent en aide par de l'argent, de l'or, des effets et du bétail, avec des dons volontaires, pour la maison de Dieu qui est à Jérusalem."
Anglais: And whosoever remaineth in any place where he sojourneth, let the men of his place help him with silver, and with gold, and with goods, and with beasts, beside the freewill offering for the house of God that is in Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay liyn kaf ma caw sumun ma hinina ka lakay hayna, sum sa hay liyna ma vulsi doorota, ora, slena hiɗi farayna, hiɗi vulda kuɗ minda kaw kay ziyda vi Lawna ta ka hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: E vôm ase ba bese be ne mebukaʼa ya bôte bé be too, bôte ya valé ba ye ve be argent, or, akum, mimbam biyem a mimvean ane nlem wo nyeʼe asu nda Zambe é ne e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Ar li misi Israyeley mindiram le ara a ra gar na, anja mizli ngi digahay a jinaka mizli mamam na, ti ɓiri bara, ɓiri tapasl tapasl, zlili mekelemey, ginew, waɗ gwat taŋ mavulaka ngi mongoy taŋ vur hay ngi Buymisemuŋ misi a Zeruzalem na!»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haa Yahuuduujo luttuɗo woni fuu, sey heeddiɗɗiraaɓe mum mballita mo bee cardi e kaŋŋeeri e jawdi e dabbaaji e caahuuji goɗɗi ngam haykaliiru Allah haa Urusaliima.”
Fulfulde_DC: Haa Yahuuduujo luttuɗo woni fuu, sey heeddiɗɗiraaɓe mum mballita mo bee cardi e kaŋŋeeri e jawdi e dabbaaji e caahuuji goɗɗi ngam haykaliiru Allah haa Urusaliima.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Fara nɛ oi dukbíí ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ, o bíí fara nɔ‘i a̧ há̧ kànà bu-mbɔi, lɔr, o de mɔ, o mɔ-dai, in ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ Jerusalɛm.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Fara nɛ oi dukbíí ko GASA WAN a̧a̧ sɛnɛ lɛŋ, o bíí fara nɔ‘i a̧ há̧ kànà bu-mbɔi, lɔr, o de mɔ, o mɔ-dai, in ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ wen Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ a̧a̧ Jerusalɛm.»
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te ŋkwa nyi nza kweci ka Israyɛl ne, pa mbeli nyi te ŋkwa shɛ kakemane hɛ le mze kwa tɛawetɛa, mze kwa tere tere, kweci wəshi ba'a wəshi keseɗa. Pa hɛ ɗave nda kweci wəshi gəmə ke hɛ kezha ghɛa Shala nya mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm.»
Tupurri: Ti ngeel ma honla äuy maga jar äen wo de gwa'ge ni mono, jar ma ti ngeel sen ni mo haç wo solay, boo biñni, feçeçre ma de el wo de horog de fuçy wo de haçge de dage wo ne hara ma joñre tiñ mani Baa maga wo Jerusalem mono.

Francais: Les chefs de famille de Juda et de Benjamin, les prêtres et les lévites, tous ceux dont Dieu excita l'esprit, se levèrent pour aller bâtir la maison de Yahweh, qui est à Jérusalem.
Anglais: Then rose up the chief of the fathers of Judah and Benjamin, and the priests, and the Levites, with all them whose spirit God had raised, to go up to build the house of the  Lord  which is in Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ki kayn nala, sa ŋulona vi jafna vi Yuda hiɗi Benyamin, muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna, nisi kaf sa Lawn zliy ŋusta visi kulona yaway kulo'o, kay kal hay nagata, kay in ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina ta ka hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: Nde menda me bôte ya Yuda a Bényamin, betuni a bone be Lévi, ba bese Zambe a nga fôʼô minlem, be nga kôlô si na be ke lôñe nda Nti nje é ne Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, buy ngi wuzla muyoy ar sukwi ngi Zuda ati ngi Benjameŋ, yo masayay ati levihey, waɗ mizli gar, Buymisemuŋ mica taŋ wuluk ngi ru nga ndira hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ a Zeruzaleme, a jaka jiviɗe, a ram so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Baaba-ci'e'en nder le'i Yahuuda e Benyamin e liman'en e Lewi'en, ɓe Allah ummini ɓerɗe maɓɓe fuu, puɗɗi yahugo, nyiɓtugo haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Baaba-ci'e'en nder le'i Yahuuda e Benyamin e liman'en e Lewi'en, ɓe Allah ummini ɓerɗe maɓɓe fuu, puɗɗi yahugo, nyiɓtugo haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O gasawi nutua ko Juda in o gasawi nù ko Bɛnjamin gú nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ká bá nɛ̀ o be Levii, ge bíí ge ndé nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ taamɔ ha̧ a̧ kura yak mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ mbo Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ duk sɛn Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O gasawi nutua ko Juda in o gasawi nù ko Bɛnjamin gú nɛ̀ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ ká bá nɛ̀ o be Levii, ge bíí ge ndé nɛ Sɔ̧ ha̧a̧ taamɔ ha̧ a̧ kura yak mɛ nɛ̀ɛ́ mbo Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ duk sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, cape mbeli nyi te ghəa hwelefe ta Zhəwda le ŋa Bɛnjamɛn, ka dzeghe Shala ba'a ka Lɛvi, geze ta ŋkɛ, pɛtɛa mbeli nyi ndeke nda zəzə Shala ke hɛ kajive kaŋa ghɛa Mahwətə pelɛ Zhɛrəzalɛm zhɛkwa.
Tupurri: Mo so no wañre ma ti äï¡ï¡ni mani Judan wo de Benjamen wo, jar sië jagn wo de jar Lefidn wo, jar maga Baa puçy ëiggi äaara go mo äuy raw wo hooge ma woge boo tiñ mani Manwur ma Jerusalem no.

Francais: Tous leurs voisins les aidèrent avec des objets d'argent, de l'or, des effets, du bétail et des choses précieuses, sans compter toutes les offrandes volontaires.
Anglais: And all they that were about them strengthened their hands with vessels of silver, with gold, with goods, and with beasts, and with precious things, beside all that was willingly offered.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa ŋuyi tisina kaf marsi gutda hiɗi slen ma ki doorota hiɗi or nala, gurjuta hiɗi farayna, hiɗi vulda minda, vulda-ɦawata hen kaf may ŋaɓayɗi.
Bulu: Ba bese be nga bômane be be nga ve be mimvolan biôme mevale meva, argent a or, akum a mimbam biyem, biôm bi ne édima, te lañe biôm bise bi nga veban ane nlem wo nyeʼe.
Guiziga: Dar midigwi taŋhay gar, a jinaka taŋ haɗi, a vulaka taŋ gwat ngi ɓiri bara ati ngi ɓiri tapasl tapaslay, zlili mekelemey, ginew, gwat mupuɗaw puɗaway waɗ gwat muvula ngi mongoy taŋhaya gar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maɓɓe mballiti ɓe bee kuuje cardi e kaŋŋeeri e jawdi e dabbaaji e kuuje ɗuuɗa-samanje e caahuuji goɗɗi boo.
Fulfulde_DC: Heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maɓɓe mballiti ɓe bee kuuje cardi e kaŋŋeeri e jawdi e dabbaaji e kuuje ɗuuɗa-samanje e caahuuji goɗɗi boo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nɛ a̧a̧ katɛ wa lɛŋ gbaka wa nɛ o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi, lɔr, o demɔ, o mɔ-dai, ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya; wi tɔr o mɔ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ ta-tɛ e zu-a na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nɛ a̧a̧ katɛ wa lɛŋ gbaka wa nɛ o mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi, lɔr, o demɔ, o mɔ-dai, ká bá nɛ̀ o mɔ nɛ gɛnɛ-a ɔ ŋgaya; wi tɔr o mɔ nɛ wa ha̧a̧ ha̧ wa nɛ ta-tɛ e zu-a na.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ ka ghedəkwəa nci kekemanakɛ hɛ le wəshi nyi le mze kwa tɛawetɛa ba'a nyi le mze kwa tere tere, le kweci wəshi ba'a wəshi keseɗa, le mama ta wəshi nyi nza zləvə te, kaɗema mbeli kese kaɓela wəshi nyi tseheke mbeli le ɗe ta nci kezha ghɛa Shala.
Tupurri: Jar leege äaara wo äuy raw wo kay rage, haç wo feçeçre ma de joñge de boo solay, de boo biñni wo de feçeçre ma de eln wo de horog de fuçy wo, haç wo feçeçre ma de wore wo ne hara debañ ciñ ti haçge de dagen wo ni pa.

Francais: Le roi Cyrus enleva les ustensiles de la maison de Yahweh, que Nabuchodonosor avait enlevés de Jérusalem et placés dans la maison de son dieu.
Anglais: Also Cyrus the king brought forth the vessels of the house of the  Lord , which Nebuchadnezzar had brought forth out of Jerusalem, and had put them in the house of his gods;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jakŋa ma mulla Nebukadnesar yawamay goy hay ziyda vi Ma-Vatɗina hay Yerusalem pa, hot lakam hay ziyda vi lawayna vamuna, mulla Sirus vulum goyo.
Bulu: Njô bôt Sirus a nga bulane fe biôm bise ya nda Nti mbie Nébukatnétzar a nga nyoñ e Yérusalém, a futi bie e ndaa zambe wé.
Guiziga: Gwatay, Nabukodonozor mihila taŋ zleˀe ar hay ngi Buymisemuŋ a Zeruzalem, ara pa taŋ ar hay kuli naŋhay na, buy Siruso, a bo taŋ a muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Laamiiɗo Koores wurtini kuuwruɗe haykaliiru Jawmiraawo ɗe Nabukodonosor hoocuno haa Urusaliima, sigino nder suudu ɗowanteeɗo muuɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Laamiiɗo Koores wurtini kuuwruɗe haykaliiru Jawmiraawo ɗe Nabukodonosor hoocuno haa Urusaliima, sigino nder suudu ɗowanteeɗo muuɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wannu Sirus kaia o nyɛk Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kaia so yaknɛ Jerusalɛm a kɔ̧ tua ko o sɔ̧ kɔ‘i gbonɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wannu Sirus kaia o nyɛk Tua ko GASA WAN nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr kaia so yaknɛ Jerusalɛm a kɔ̧ tua ko o sɔ̧ kɔ‘i gbonɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Nahe meghe Sirəs le ghəa ŋkɛ kezhɛneke wəshi nyi nza zləvə te hɛ, nyi fəhwe Nabəkodonozor shave mbe ghɛa Mahwətə pelɛ Zhɛrəzalɛm kezha fəyi ki ghɛa yɛ shala ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Wañ Sirus raw fer feçeçre ma äil tiñ mani Manwur maga Nebukanetsar hay hoo ra le Jerusalem day hay laa ra go äil tiñ mani baa äen mono.

Francais: Cyrus, roi de Perse, les confia aux mains de Mithridate, le trésorier, qui les transmit en les comptant à Sassabasar, le prince de Juda.
Anglais: Even those did Cyrus king of Persia bring forth by the hand of Mithredath the treasurer, and numbered them unto Sheshbazzar, the prince of Judah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sirus, mulla vi Persiya gi Midredat ma ŋom slena kay nam yawamay goyo, nam vulum hay ɓam Sesbatsar ma yerimana vi Yuda.
Bulu: Sirus njô bôte ya Perse a nga bo na Mitredat, mbaʼale nkop, a kuli bie atan a kalane bie Sésbatsar, évete ya Yuda.
Guiziga: Sirus, buy Perse, a vula jiviɗ da Mitredat, mbur miji zlili, ɓa a pula gwat tayna asi haŋ ngi Sesebasar, yarama ngi ruwuy Zuda.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Koores, laamiiɗo Persiya umri Mitiridat, kaliifaajo ndesaari, o wurtini ɗe, o limti ɗe, o hokkiti ɗe Sesbaccar, ardiiɗo Yahuuda.
Fulfulde_DC: Koores, laamiiɗo Persiya umri Mitiridat, kaliifaajo ndesaari, o wurtini ɗe, o limti ɗe, o hokkiti ɗe Sesbaccar, ardiiɗo Yahuuda.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ Mitredat wi-zɔk-mbɔi mɛ kai wa, ɓɛɛ Mitredat tɔ̧ ha̧ Sɛsbasar be-wan Juda mɛ tɔr tɔra-a.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ ha̧a̧ nú ha̧ Mitredat wi-zɔk-mbɔi mɛ kai wa, ɓɛɛ Mitredat tɔ̧ ha̧ Sɛsbasar be-wan Juda mɛ tɔr tɔra-a.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa gezete meghe ne, pa Mitrɛdat nya te ghəa mcɛlə dapate nda wəshia shɛhɛ te dzeve ke Shɛshebasar nya kawəndə nya te ghə mbe Zhəwda.
Tupurri: Sirus wañ Perse raw wii Mitredad je ëaw horogn ga aà mo hoo ra le go siigi. Se raw kee rage go, haç ra ne Sekbasar, wañ ma pel jar Judan wo do.

Francais: En voici le nombre: trente bassins d'or, mille bassins d'argent, vingt-neuf couteaux,
Anglais: And this is the number of them: thirty chargers of gold, a thousand chargers of silver, nine and twenty knives,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi ŋaɓta valamu: Tasa ŋulona ma ora dok-ɦidi, tasa ma ŋulona ma doorona birim kep, kewn dok-ma' yam zleeŋe,
Bulu: Tañe ya biôm bite é mbe avale di: befandé be or mewôm mela, befandé be argent toyini awôm, atyeñ mewôm mela,
Guiziga: Gwat tayna, a slufaka t'ani hĩ: taasa mipitikayya pitikayya ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl, kukur makir, waɗ ngi ɓiri bara durmuk pal, sliwiɗ kukur cuw nga ngoltir,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa limgal maaje: Taasaaje kaŋŋeeri cappanɗe tati (30) e taasaaje cardi ujineere (1.000) e laɓe noogas e joweenayi (29)
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa limgal maaje: Taasaaje kaŋŋeeri cappanɗe tati (30) e taasaaje cardi ujineere (1.000) e laɓe noogas e joweenayi (29)
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ wa tɔra nɛ mɔ'ɔ: nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr ɓu-taar; nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi booro; paa ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ nɛ wa tɔra nɛ mɔ'ɔ: nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr ɓu-taar; nyɛk nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi booro; paa ɓu-yiitoo-zua-mɔɔrɔ-ɗoŋ-naar;
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ɓela ta nci nyi: parantɛ nyi le mze kwa tere tere mahekenemsə, parantɛ nyi le mze kwa tɛawetɛa slibə, hwa bakemsə meslighəmbe,
Tupurri: Mokay no diñ ngaäa feçeçre sen wo: Tasa boo biñni do swa'a, tasa boo solay ndare, mbegre wo do äog ti kaawa'a,

Francais: trente coupes d'or, quatre cent dix coupes d'argent de second ordre, et mille autres ustensiles.
Anglais: Thirty basins of gold, silver basins of a second sort four hundred and ten, and other vessels a thousand.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kaway-ma-cina ma ora doogo, kaway-ma-cina ma doorona kis-fiɗi hiɗi diram doogo, sle hena birim ɗaw.
Bulu: bilaé bi argent mewôm mela, fia bilaé bi argent mintet minyin a awôme da, biôm bife toyini jia.
Guiziga: zuŋ skiɗ ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl, kukur makir, waɗ ngi ɓiri bara, ngi gi slra ho gar, skat skat mufaɗ ti kuruˀu, waɗ gwat mekelemey, durmuk pal.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e bulki kaŋŋeeri cappanɗe tati e bulki cardi teemeɗɗe nayi e sappo (410) e kuuwruɗe feere ujineere (1.000) .
Fulfulde_DC: e bulki kaŋŋeeri cappanɗe tati e bulki cardi teemeɗɗe nayi e sappo (410) e kuuwruɗe feere ujineere (1.000) .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr ɓu-taar; mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi gɔmŋmaa-naar-nɛ-ɓu; in o ŋma géé nyɛk booro.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr ɓu-taar; mɔɔ-nɔ-mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ bu-mbɔi gɔmŋmaa-naar-nɛ-ɓu; in o ŋma géé nyɛk booro.
Kapsiki_DC: darawe nyi le mze kwa tere tere mahekenemsə, darawe nyi le mze kwa tɛawetɛa nya ɗema zləvə te ndeɗekə gwəmsə wəfaɗe ba'a meŋe ba'a kweci wəshia shɛhɛ slibə.
Tupurri: kob boo biñni do swa'a, kob boo solay ma äil äogäog wo kiskis naa ti äe hwale, feçeçre ma tigriñ wo ni ndar lay.

Francais: Tous les objets d'or et d'argent étaient au nombre de cinq mille quatre cents. Sassabasar emporta le tout, lorsque les exilés furent ramenée de Babylone à Jérusalem.
Anglais: All the vessels of gold and of silver were five thousand and four hundred. All these did Sheshbazzar bring up with them of the captivity that were brought up from Babylon unto Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jakŋa ma ora hiɗi ma wayna tapay pet birim vasl ɦidi kis-fiɗi. Sesbatsar kalam hay nagata valam kaf, ŋray ca kaw hiɗi sa gorvona sa yawsiyays hay Babilon pa, kalsi hay Yerusalem kaw.
Bulu: Biôm bise bi mbe mboon a or a argent bi mbe toyini étan a mintet minyin. Sésbatsar a nga bo na biôm bite bi ke nsamba bôt be nga too minkôm be nga kôlô Babilôn a ke e Yérusalém.
Guiziga: Jommo gar na, gwat ngi ɓiri tapasl tapasl ati ngi ɓiri bara, a gam le durmuk zlum ti skat skat mufaɗa. Ti mizli mijahay macohom ti Babiloŋ nga Zeruzaleme, Sesebasar a hila gwat tayna cek a haŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal kuuwruɗe cardi e kaŋŋeeri fuu, ujine jowi e teemeɗɗe nayi (5.400). Kuuwruɗe ɗe'e fuu, Sesbaccar hoori ɗe hawtaade bee dahaaɓeno diga Baabila haa Urusaliima.
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal kuuwruɗe cardi e kaŋŋeeri fuu, ujine jowi e teemeɗɗe nayi (5.400). Kuuwruɗe ɗe'e fuu, Sesbaccar hoori ɗe hawtaade bee dahaaɓeno diga Baabila haa Urusaliima.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-mɔɔrɔ-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-naar. Sɛsbasar kaia o nyɛk nɔ‘i lɛŋ sinɛ ŋgimbi nɛ o bara-biro daŋa nɛnɛ nɛ Babilɔŋ si Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O mɔ nɛ‘i dee nɛ lɔr in bu-mbɔi nɔ‘i lɛŋ nɛ́ booro-mɔɔrɔ-nɛ-gɔmŋmaa-naar. Sɛsbasar kaia o nyɛk nɔ‘i lɛŋ sinɛ ŋgimbi nɛ o bara-biro daŋa nɛnɛ nɛ Babilɔŋ si Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma jikə wəshi nyi le mze kwa tere tere ba'a nyi le mze kwa tɛawetɛa pɛtɛ ne, 5.400 hɛ. Pɛtɛ fəte hɛ Shɛshebasar kwa slə hɛ le kweci mbeli nyi fəghe mbeli shave mbe Babilone kadzeme Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Feçeçre ma de joñge de boo biñni wo de boo solay hay wo äuy ndar dwee ti äe kiskis naa, Sekbasar raw rawge de äaara wer jar maga hay wo le go ti dañgay ga men wo Babilon go, fer wo Jerusalem mono.

Francais: Voici les gens de la province qui revinrent de l'exil,-- ceux que Nabuchodonosor, roi de Babylone, avait emmenés captifs à Babylone, et qui retournèrent à Jérusalem et en Juda, chacun dans sa ville,--
Anglais: Now these are the children of the province that went up out of the captivity, of those which had been carried away, whom Nebuchadnezzar the king of Babylon had carried away unto Babylon, and came again unto Jerusalem and Judah, every one unto his city;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni nisi sa hotay goy hay nagat ta gorvot pa, nisi sa Nebukadnesar mulla vi Babilon yawsi goy gorvo'o hay Babilon, nisi sa hotay hay Yerusalem hiɗi Yuda, gigekaw hay hoyok-ziyna valamu valamu.
Bulu: Môé me bôte ya Palestine (bone bʼIsraél) mbe Nébukatnétzar njô bôte ya Babilôn a nga kee be minkôm e Babilôn a mbe be nga kôlô minkôm a bulan e Yérusalém a e Yuda, mme ma, môt ase e tisone jé.
Guiziga: Nabukodonozor, buy madiɗa ngi Babiloŋ, mizli, naŋ mija taŋ zleˀe nga Babiloŋ na, mizli asi taŋ mumoko nga Zeruzalem waɗ nga Zuda, mbur gar aru ng'ar walahay nga naŋ nga naŋ na, t'ani.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa limtuki yimɓe lesdi Yahuuda wartuɓe diga daheeki. Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila dahino ɓe haa Baabila. Ɓe kooti Urusaliima e Yahuuda, koo moy haa wuro muuɗum.
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa limtuki yimɓe lesdi Yahuuda wartuɓe diga daheeki. Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila dahino ɓe haa Baabila. Ɓe kooti Urusaliima e Yahuuda, koo moy haa wuro muuɗum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ baa kai so yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ pia ɗoŋ nɛ dɔka-a mɛ ba nù kɔ-wa. Wa pia pii Jerusalɛm in nù Juda, kóó o ndé pii saaye kɔ‘i. O wi nɔ‘i nɛ pia ɗoŋ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nɛ Nabukɔdɔnɔsɔr wannu Babilɔŋ baa kai so yaknɛ si Babilɔŋ pia ɗoŋ nɛ dɔka-a mɛ ba nù kɔ-wa. Wa pia pii Jerusalɛm in nù Juda, kóó o ndé pii saaye kɔ‘i. O wi nɔ‘i nɛ pia ɗoŋ‘i nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi sləa mbeli nyi te hɛɗia Zhəwda, nyi fəghe Nabəkodonozor, meghea ka Babilone kadzembe Babilone nda zhɛneke geva hɛ kadzembe Zhɛrəzalɛm ba'a kadzembe Zhəwda nyi. Yayata wəndə kadzembe meleme ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Mokay no diñ keege jar maga wañ Nebukanetsar hay hoo ra wo go ti dañgay Babilon day fer wo le Jerusalem wo de Juda mono. Jar sen hay wo diñ biñni prog ma Juda no, saara fer le, wosela äuy äi leege äe.

Francais: qui revinrent avec Zorobabel, Josué, Néhémie, Saraïas, Rahélaïas, Mardochée, Belsan, Mesphar, Béguaï, Réhum, Baana. Nombre des hommes du peuple d'Israël :
Anglais: Which came with Zerubbabel: Jeshua, Nehemiah, Seraiah, Reelaiah, Mordecai, Bilshan, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehum, Baanah. The number of the men of the people of Israel:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi hotay hiɗi Zorobabel, Yosuwa, Nehemiya, Seraya, Reelaya, Mardose, Bilsan, Mispar, Bigvay, Rehum, Baana. Ŋaɓta vi jufayna kuɗ sumuna vi Israyel:
Bulu: Be nga bulan ba be Zôrôbabél, Yasua, Néhémie, Séraya, Rilaya, Mardôsé, Bilkan, Mispar, Bignayi Reyum a Baana. Befam bese ya Israél be mbe ana:
Guiziga: Mukoko taŋ mbuŋ i ti: Zorobabel, Yesuwa, Nehemiya, Seraya, Relaya, Mordokay, Bilesaŋ, Mispar, Bigivay, Rehum waɗ Baˀana. Mizli Israyel, mizileheye t'ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe'e ngarti bee Zorobaabila e Yeesu'a e Nehemiya e Seraya e Re'elaya e Mardokay e Bilsan e Mispar e Biguway e Rehum e Ba'ana. Ndaa limgal Isra'iila'en:
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe'e ngarti bee Zorobaabila e Yeesu'a e Nehemiya e Seraya e Re'elaya e Mardokay e Bilsan e Mispar e Biguway e Rehum e Ba'ana. Ndaa limgal Isra'iila'en:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa pia in o gasawi kɔ-wa Zorobabɛl, Josue, Nehemii, Sɛraya, Relaya, Mɔrdɔkai, Bilsaŋ, Mispar, Bigvai, Rɛhum in Baana. Dùk be  Israɛl  nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa pia in o gasawi kɔ-wa Zorobabɛl, Josue, Nehemii, Sɛraya, Relaya, Mɔrdɔkai, Bilsaŋ, Mispar, Bigvai, Rɛhum in Baana. Dùk be  Israɛl  nɛ́ mɔ'ɔ:
Kapsiki_DC: Ghenci ka zhɛreke geva zlaɓe le yɛ Zorobabɛl, Yɛshəwa, Nɛhɛmi, Seraya, Rɛlaya, Mordokay, Bileshan, Mispar, Bigvay, Rehəwm ba'a Ba'ana. Wa nyi sləa ka Israyɛl nyi kewəvəsə kewəvəsə:
Tupurri: Saara fer le wer Sorobabel, Josuwe, Nehemi, Seraya, Reelaya, Mardose, Bilkan, Mispar, Bigfay, Rehum wo de Baana. Lam no diñ keege jar Israyel wo:

Francais: les fils de Pharos, deux mille cent soixante-douze ;
Anglais: The children of Parosh, two thousand an hundred seventy and two.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Parewos: Birim ma' hiɗi kis kalam dok-siɗiya yam ma',
Bulu: Bone be Paréôk: toyini ébaé, ntete wua, mewôm zamgbwa a bebaé.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Parokoy: durmuk cuw ti skat ti kukur tarnaˀ nga cuw,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Par'os, yimɓe ujine ɗiɗo e teemerre e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e ɗiɗo (2.172).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Par'os, yimɓe ujine ɗiɗo e teemerre e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e ɗiɗo (2.172).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nú-gara ko Parɔs nɛ́ bíí 2.172;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nú-gara ko Parɔs nɛ́ bíí 2.172;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa yita ta Parosh: 2.172,
Tupurri: Jar ni Pareos wo ndar äog ti äe kis de do renam ti äoge.

Francais: les fils de Saphatias, trois cent soixante-douze ;
Anglais: The children of Shephatiah, three hundred seventy and two.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Sefatiya: Kis-ɦidi kalam dok-siɗiya yam ma',
Bulu: Bone be Sefatia: mintete milaa, mewôme zamgbwa a bebaé.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Sefatiyahay: skat skat makir ti kukur tarnaˀ nga cuw,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Sefatiya, yimɓe teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e ɗiɗo (372).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Sefatiya, yimɓe teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e ɗiɗo (372).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Sɛfatia nɛ́ 372;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Sɛfatia nɛ́ 372;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa yita ta Shefatiya: 372,
Tupurri: Jar ni Sefatiya wo kiskis swa' de do renam ti äoge.

Francais: les fils d'Aréa, sept cent soixante-quinze;
Anglais: The children of Arah, seven hundred seventy and five.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Arah: Kis-siɗiya kalam dok-siɗiya yam vasl.
Bulu: Bone bʼAra: mintete zamgbwa, mewôm zamgbwa a betan.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Arahay: skat skat tarnaˀ ti kukur tarnaˀnga zlum,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Araha, yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e njowo (775).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Araha, yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e njowo (775).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Ara nɛ́ 775;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Ara nɛ́ 775;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa yita ta Ara: 775,
Tupurri: Jar ni Ara wo kiskis renam de do renam ti dwee.

Francais: les fils de Phahath-Moab, des fils de Josué et de Joab, deux mille huit cent douze;
Anglais: The children of Pahath–moab, of the children of Jeshua and Joab, two thousand eight hundred and twelve.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Pahat-Mowab, jar gurona vi Yosuwa hiɗi Yowab: Birim ma' hiɗi kis-glafandi kalam doogo yam ma';
Bulu: Bone be Payat-Môab, bone be Yasua a Yôab: toyini ébaé, mintete muam, awôme da a bebaé.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Pahat-Maˀapay, a mbiɗeˀvra, dideˀ ngi Yesuwa ati ngi Yoˀapay: durmuk cuw ti skat skat dangafaɗ ti kuruˀ nga cuw,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Pahat-Mo'ab, waato danygol Yeesu'a e Yo'ab, yimɓe ujine ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweetato e sappo e ɗiɗo (2.812).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Pahat-Mo'ab, waato danygol Yeesu'a e Yo'ab, yimɓe ujine ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweetato e sappo e ɗiɗo (2.812).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Pahat-Mɔab, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Yesua in Yɔab nɛ́ 2.812;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Pahat-Mɔab, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Yesua in Yɔab nɛ́ 2.812;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa yita ta Pahat-Mowab, hwelefe ta yɛ Yɛshəwa le Yowab: 2.812,
Tupurri: Jar ni Pahat-Mowab ga wo diñ jar ni Josuwe wo de Jowab wo ndar äog ti äe kiskis nenma' de jar hwal ti äoge.

Francais: les fils d'Elam, mille deux cent cinquante-quatre;
Anglais: The children of Elam, a thousand two hundred fifty and four.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Elam: Birim kep hiɗi kis-ma' kalam dok-vasl yam fiɗi;
Bulu: Bone bʼElam: toyini jia, mintete mibaé, mewôm metan a benyin.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Elamay: durmuk ti skat skat cuw ti kukur zlum nga mufaɗa,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Elam, yimɓe ujineere e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe njowo e nayo (1.254).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Elam, yimɓe ujineere e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe njowo e nayo (1.254).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Elam nɛ́ 1.254;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Elam nɛ́ 1.254;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa Yita ta Ɛlam: 1.254,
Tupurri: Jar ni Elam wo ndar ti äe kiskis äog de do dwee ti naa.

Francais: les fils de Zéthua, neuf cent quarante-cinq;
Anglais: The children of Zattu, nine hundred forty and five.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Zattu: Kis-zleeŋe hiɗi diram dok-fiɗi yam vasl;
Bulu: Bone be Zatu: mintet ébu, mewôm menyin a betan.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Zatuhoy: skat skat ngoltir ti kukur mufaɗ nga zlum,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Zattu, yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweenayo e cappanɗe nayo e njowo (945).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Zattu, yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweenayo e cappanɗe nayo e njowo (945).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Zatu 945;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Zatu 945;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa yita ta Zatəw: 945,
Tupurri: Jar ni Satu wo kiskis kaawa' de do naa ti dwee.

Francais: les fils de Zachaï, sept cent soixante;
Anglais: The children of Zaccai, seven hundred and threescore.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Zakkay: Kis-siɗiya kalam dok-karkiya;
Bulu: Bone be Zakayi: mintete zamgbwa a mewôm mesaman.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Zakayay: skat skat tarnaˀ ti kukur merkeɗe,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Zakkay, yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweego (760).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Zakkay, yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweego (760).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Zakai nɛ́ 760;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Zakai nɛ́ 760;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa yita ta Zakay: 760,
Tupurri: Jar ni Sakay wo kiskis renam de do hiira'a.

BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sum sa may goy hay Lod, Hadid hiɗi Ono pana: Kis-siɗiya kalam dok-ma' yam vasl;
Bulu: Bebialébialé ya Lôd, ba ya Adid a ba ya Onô: mintet zamgbwa, mewôm mebaé a betan.
Guiziga: ziri ngir walahay Lot, Hadit waɗ Ono: skat skat tarnaˀ ti kukur cuw nga zlum,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Lodo e Hadida e Oono, teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e noogas e njowo (725).
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Lodo e Hadida e Oono, teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e noogas e njowo (725).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o be Lod in Hadid in Ɔnɔ nɛ́ 725;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o be Lod in Hadid in Ɔnɔ nɛ́ 725;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi mbe meleme ta yɛ Lod, Hadid le Ono: 725,
Tupurri: Jar Lod, Hadid wo de Ono wo kisksi renam ti äe do äog ti dwee.

Francais: les fils de Jéricho, trois cent quarante-cinq;
Anglais: The children of Jericho, three hundred forty and five.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sum sa may goy hay Yeriko pana: Kis-ɦidi kalam dok-fiɗi yam vasl,
Bulu: Bebialébialé ya Yérikô: mintet mila, mewôm menyin a betan.
Guiziga: ziri Zerikohoy: skat skat makir ti kukur mufaɗ nga zlum,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe Yeriko, teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe nayo e njowo (345).
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe Yeriko, teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe nayo e njowo (345).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o be Jeriko nɛ́ 345;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o be Jeriko nɛ́ 345;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi mbe meleme ta Zhɛriko: 345,
Tupurri: Jar Jeriko wo kiskis swa' ti äe do naa ti dwee.

Francais: les fils de Senaa, trois mille six cent trente.
Anglais: The children of Senaah, three thousand and six hundred and thirty.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sum sa may goy hay Sena pana: Birim ɦidi hiɗi kis-karkiya kalam dok-ɦidi.
Bulu: Ba ya Senaa: toyini élaa, mintet misaman a mewôm mela.
Guiziga: ziri Senaˀahay: durmuk makir ti skat skat merkeɗ ti kukur makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Senaa, yimɓe ujine tato e teemeɗɗe njoweego e cappanɗe tato (3.630).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Senaa, yimɓe ujine tato e teemeɗɗe njoweego e cappanɗe tato (3.630).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o be Sɛnaa 3.630
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o be Sɛnaa 3.630
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi mbe meleme ta Sena'a: 3.630.
Tupurri: Jar Senaa wo ndar swa' ti äe kiskis hiira' de jar do swa'a.

Francais: Prêtres: les fils de Iadaïas, de la maison de Josué, neuf cent soixante-treize;
Anglais: The priests: the children of Jedaiah, of the house of Jeshua, nine hundred seventy and three.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna, gurona vi Yedaya hay jafna vi Yosuwa: Kis-zleeŋe hiɗi diram dok-siɗiya yam ɦidi;
Bulu: Betuni: bone be Yédaéya, nda Yasua: mintet ébu mewôm zamgbwa a belaa.
Guiziga: Ngay ngi masayay ani: muy ngi Yedayahay, dideˀ ngi Yesuwahay: skat skat ngoltir ti kukur tarnaˀ nga makir,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal liman'en: Danygol Yeda'ya, waato danygol Yeesu'a, yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweenayo e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e tato (973).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal liman'en: Danygol Yeda'ya, waato danygol Yeesu'a, yimɓe teemeɗɗe njoweenayo e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e tato (973).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bíí nú-gara ko Yɛdaya; mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧ o bezaŋ Josue nɛ́ 973;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o bíí nú-gara ko Yɛdaya; mɛ nɛ wen nɛ tɔ̧ o bezaŋ Josue nɛ́ 973;
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya tsetse wəvəsəa ka dzeghe Shala: zhili nyi kwa yita ta Yedaya, hwelefe ta Yɛshəwa: 973,
Tupurri: Jar sië jagn wo: Jar ni Yedaya ti feele mani Josuwen wo kiskis kaawa' de do renam ti swa'a.

Francais: les fils d'Emmer, mille cinquante-deux ;
Anglais: The children of Immer, a thousand fifty and two.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Immer: Birim kep kalam dok-vasl yam ma';
Bulu: Bone bʼImer: toyini jia, mewôm metan a bebaé.
Guiziga: muy ngi Imerey: durmuk ti kukur zlum nga cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Immer, yimɓe ujineere e cappanɗe njowo e ɗiɗo (1.052).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Immer, yimɓe ujineere e cappanɗe njowo e ɗiɗo (1.052).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Imɛr nɛ́ bíí 1.052;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Imɛr nɛ́ bíí 1.052;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa yita ta Imɛr: 1.052,
Tupurri: Jar ni Imer wo ndar de jar do dwee ti äoge.

Francais: les fils de Phashur, mille deux cent quarante sept ;
Anglais: The children of Pashur, a thousand two hundred forty and seven.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Pakhur: Birim kep hiɗi kis-ma' kalam dok-fiɗi yam siɗiya;
Bulu: Bone be Pasur: toyini jia, mintete mibaé, mewôm menyin a zamgbwa.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Pasehuroy: durmuk ti skat skat cuw ti kukur mufaɗ nga tarnaˀ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Pashuuru, yimɓe ujineere e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe nayo e njoweeɗiɗo (1.247).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Pashuuru, yimɓe ujineere e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe nayo e njoweeɗiɗo (1.247).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Pasɛhur nɛ́ 1.247;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Pasɛhur nɛ́ 1.247;
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa yita ta Pashehəwr: 1.247,
Tupurri: Jar ni Pashur wo ndar ti äe kiskis äog de do naa ti rename.

Francais: les fils de Harim, mille dix-sept.
Anglais: The children of Harim, a thousand and seventeen.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Harim: Birim kep kalam doogo yam siɗiya;
Bulu: Bone bʼArim: toyini jia, awôme da a zamgbwa.
Guiziga: dideˀ ngi Harimey: durmuk ti kuruˀ nga tarnaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Harim, yimɓe ujineere e sappo e njoweeɗiɗo (1.017).
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Harim, yimɓe ujineere e sappo e njoweeɗiɗo (1.017).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Harim nɛ́ 1.017.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Harim nɛ́ 1.017.
Kapsiki_DC: zhili nyi kwa yita ta Harim: 1.017.
Tupurri: Jar ni Harim wo ndar de jar hwal ti rename.

Francais: Lévites : les fils de Josué et de Cedmiel, des fils d'Oduïas, soixante-quatorze.
Anglais: The Levites: the children of Jeshua and Kadmiel, of the children of Hodaviah, seventy and four.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa Levitna, gurona vi Yosuwa hiɗi Kadmiyel, jar gurona vi Hodaviya: Dok-siɗiya yam fiɗi;
Bulu: Bone be Lévi: bone be Yasua baa Kadmiél ya bone bʼOdavia: mewôm zamgbwa a benyin.
Guiziga: Ngay ngi levihey ani: dideˀ ngi Yesuwa ati ngi Kaɗmiyeley, a mbiɗeˀvra, dideˀ ngi Hadaviyahay: kukur tarnaˀ nga mufaɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal Lewi'en: Danygol Yeesu'a e Kadmiyel waato danygol Hodawiya, yimɓe cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e nayo (74).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal Lewi'en: Danygol Yeesu'a e Kadmiyel waato danygol Hodawiya, yimɓe cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e nayo (74).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Levii, tɛ nú-gara ko Yesua in Kadmiɛl, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Hɔdavia nɛ́ bíí 74.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Tɛ zuduk ko Levii, tɛ nú-gara ko Yesua in Kadmiɛl, mɛ̀ nɛ́ wen nɛ tɔ̧, o bezaŋ Hɔdavia nɛ́ bíí 74.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya tsetse wəvəsəa ka Lɛvi: mberefaŋemsə wəfaɗeghəmbe zhili nyi kwa yita ta yɛ Yɛshəwa, Kadmiyɛl, Binəwi le Hodaviya.
Tupurri: Jar Lefidn wo: Jar ni Josuwe wo de Kadmiyele, jar ni Hodafiya wo, sen wo do renam ti na.

Francais: Chantres : les fils d'Asaph, cent vingt-huit.
Anglais: The singers: the children of Asaph, an hundred twenty and eight.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa gi nulla, gurona vi Asaf: Kis kalam dok-ma' yam glafandi.
Bulu: Beyia bia: bone bʼAsaf: ntete wua, mewôm mebaé a muam.
Guiziga: Ngay ngi mizli mazlam dimis ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ: dideˀ ngi A safay: skat ti kukur cuw nga dangafaɗa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal yimooɓe: Danygol Asaf, yimɓe teemerre e noogas e njoweetato (128).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal yimooɓe: Danygol Asaf, yimɓe teemerre e noogas e njoweetato (128).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-bii-gima kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, nú-gara ko Asaf nɛ́ 128.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-bii-gima kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧, nú-gara ko Asaf nɛ́ 128.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya tsetse wəvəsəa ka gha cimə: 128 zhili nyi kwa yita ta Asaf.
Tupurri: Jar 'wad siñ wo: Jar ni Asaf wo kis de do äog ti nenma'aç.

Francais: Fils des portiers: les fils de Sellum, les fils d'Ater, les fils de Telmon, les fils d'Accub, les fils de Hatita, les fils de Sobaï, en tout cent trente-neuf.
Anglais: The children of the porters: the children of Shallum, the children of Ater, the children of Talmon, the children of Akkub, the children of Hatita, the children of Shobai, in all an hundred thirty and nine.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi sa ŋom vun-ziyna, gurona vi Sallum, gurona vi Ater, gurona vi Talmon, gurona vi Akkub, gurona vi Hatita, gurona vi Sobay, noŋ pet kis kalam dok-ɦidi yam zleeŋe.
Bulu: Bebaʼale mimbé: bone be Salum, bone bʼAter, bone be Talmon, bone bʼAkub, bone bʼAtita, bone be Kôbayi, bese: ntete wua, mewôm mela a ébu.
Guiziga: Mijigina mizlingreheye: i ziri ngi Salumoy, ngi Aterey, ngi Talmoŋhoy, ngi Akup, ngi Hatita waɗ ngi Kobayay: skat ti kukur makir nga ngoltir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal aynooɓe dammuɗe: Danygol Sallum e Ater e Talmon e Akkubu e Hatita e Sobay, ɓe fuu ɓe teemerre e cappanɗe tato e njoweenayo (139).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal aynooɓe dammuɗe: Danygol Sallum e Ater e Talmon e Akkubu e Hatita e Sobay, ɓe fuu ɓe teemerre e cappanɗe tato e njoweenayo (139).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi-pɛm-nú tua ko Sɔ̧, nú-gara ko Salum, ko Atɛr, ko Talmɔŋ, ko Akub, ko Hatita ká bá nɛ̀ ko Sɔbai nɛ́ bíí 139.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-pɛm-nú tua ko Sɔ̧, nú-gara ko Salum, ko Atɛr, ko Talmɔŋ, ko Akub, ko Hatita ká bá nɛ̀ ko Sɔbai nɛ́ bíí 139.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya tsetse wəvəsəa ka ya degha: gwəmsə ba'a mahekenemsə meslighəmbe zhili nyi kwa yita ta Shaləwm, Atɛr, Talmon, Akəwb, Hatita ba'a Shobay.
Tupurri: Jar gor jag faagen wo: Jar ni Salum wo, jar ni Ater wo, jar ni Talmon wo, jar ni Akub wo, jar ni Hatita wo, jar ni Sobay wo, saara tay äuy kis ti äe do swa' ti kaawa'a.

Francais: Nathinéens : les fils de Siha, les fils de Hasupha, les fils de Tabbaoth,
Anglais: The Nethinims: the children of Ziha, the children of Hasupha, the children of Tabbaoth,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa Netiniyena, gurona vi Siha, gurona vi Hasufa, gurona vi Tabawot,
Bulu: Benétinieñ: bone be Tiya, bon bʼAsufer, bone be Tabaôt.
Guiziga: Gawla migi slrahay ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ: i ziri ngi Sihahay, ngi Hasufa, ngi Tabaˀot,

Fulfulde_DC: __Error__

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ mɛ̀ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Siha, ko Hasufa, ko Tabaot;
Kapsiki_DC: Ma wəvəsəa ka mene slene mbe ghɛa Shala ne, hwelefe ta yɛ Siha, Hasəwfa, Tabawot,
Tupurri: Jar Netiniyeçeç wo: Jar ni Siha wo, jar ni Hasufa wo, jar ni Tabaod wo,

KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Nɛsia ká bá nɛ̀ ko Hatifa.
Kapsiki_DC: Nɛsiya ba'a Hatifa.
Tupurri: Jar ni Netsiya wo, jar ni Hatifa wo.

Francais: Fils des serviteurs de Salomon : les fils de Sotaï, les fils de Sophéret, les fils de Pharuda,
Anglais: The children of Solomon's servants: the children of Sotai, the children of Sophereth, the children of Peruda,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi sa sunda vi Salomon: Gurona vi Sotay, gurona vi Soferet, gurona vi Peruda,
Bulu: Bone bebo bisaé be Solômon: bone be Sôtayi, bone be Sôferét, bone be Peruda.
Guiziga: Ngay ngi dideˀ ngi gawla ngi Salomoŋhoy i ti: dideˀ ngi Satayay, ngi Soferetey, ngi Peruda,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Sotai, ko Soferɛt, ko Pɛruda;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Sotai, ko Soferɛt, ko Pɛruda;
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nya tsetse wəvəsəa hwelefe ta ka mene slene ta Salomon: hwelefefia Sotay, Sofɛrɛt, Perəwda,
Tupurri: Jar ni weere joçoçre Salomon wo: Jar ni Sotay wo, jar ni Sofered wo, jar ni Peruda wo,

Francais: les fils de Jala, les fils de Dercon, les fils de Geddel,
Anglais: The children of Jaalah, the children of Darkon, the children of Giddel,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Yaala, gurona vi Darkon, gurona vi Giddel,
Bulu: Bone be Yaala, bone be Darkôn, bone be Gidél.
Guiziga: ngi Yala, Darkoŋ, Gidel,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Yala, ko Darkɔŋ, ko Gidɛl;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Yala, ko Darkɔŋ, ko Gidɛl;
Kapsiki_DC: Yala, Darkon, Gidɛl,
Tupurri: Jar ni Yaala wo, jar ni Darkon wo, jar ni Gidel wo,

Francais: les fils de Saphatia, les fils de Hatil, les fils de Phochéreth-Asebaïm, les fils d'Ami.
Anglais: The children of Shephatiah, the children of Hattil, the children of Pochereth of Zebaim, the children of Ami.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: gurona vi Sefatiya, gurona vi Hattil, gurona vi Pokeret-Hatsebayim, gurona vi Ami.
Bulu: Bone be Sefatia, bone bʼAtil, bone be Pôkérét-Atsebayim, bone bʼAmi.
Guiziga: Sefatiya, Hatil, Pokeret-Hasebayim waɗ dideˀ ngi Amihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: ko Sɛfatia, ko Hatil, ko Pokɛrɛt-Hasɛbayim, ká bá nɛ ko Ami.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: ko Sɛfatia, ko Hatil, ko Pokɛrɛt-Hasɛbayim, ká bá nɛ ko Ami.
Kapsiki_DC: Shefatiya, Hatil, Pokɛrɛt-Hasebayim ba'a Ami.
Tupurri: Jar ni Sefatiya wo, jar ni Hatil wo, jar ni Pokered-Hasebayim wo, jar ni Ami wo.

Francais: Total des Nathinéens et des fils des serviteurs de Salomon : trois cent quatre-vingt-douze.
Anglais: All the Nethinims, and the children of Solomon's servants, were three hundred ninety and two.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tapta vi sa Netiniyena hiɗi sa sunda vi Salomon: Kis-ɦidi kalam dok-zleeŋe yam ma'.
Bulu: Benétinieñ bese a bone bebo bisaé be Solômon: mintete mila, mewôm ébu a bebaé.
Guiziga: Gawla migi slrahay ar hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ waɗ dideˀ ngi gawla ngi salomoŋhoyo, jom gar na, taŋ mizli skat skat makir ti kukur ngoltir nga cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru e danygol jeyaaɓe Suleymaanu fuu, teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweenayo e ɗiɗo (392).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru e danygol jeyaaɓe Suleymaanu fuu, teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweenayo e ɗiɗo (392).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Dɔka wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ 392.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Dɔka wi-de-tom kɔ̧ Tua ko Sɔ̧ in bezaŋ o wi-de-tom ko Salomɔŋ nɛ́ 392.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛa ka mene mbe ghɛa Shala ba'a hwelefefia ka mene slene ta Salomon ne, zhili gwəmsə mahekene ba'a meslimsə bakeghəmbe.
Tupurri: Jar Netiniyeçeç wo de jar ni weere joçoçre Salomoñ wo kiskis swa' ti äe do kaawa' ti äoge.

Francais: Voici ceux qui partirent de Thel-Méla, Thel-Harsa, Chérub, Addon, Emmer, et qui ne purent pas faire connaître leur maison paternelle et leur race, pour montrer qu'ils étaient d'Israël :
Anglais: And these were they which went up from Tel–melah, Tel–harsha, Cherub, Addan, and Immer: but they could not shew their father's house, and their seed, whether they were of Israel:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si sa yaway goy hay Tel-Mela, Tel-Harsa, hay Kerub-Adan hiɗi Immer, nisi kayni si sa fi a ɗek jafna visi hiɗi vuɗna visi goy a san ma wisi ala nisi mi jafna vi Israyellaɗi.
Bulu: Bana be ne bôt be nga kôlô Tél-Mela, Tél-Arsa, Kerub-Adañ a Imer, mbe be nga bo teke nguleya bo na bôt be yem menda me bôte map a mvoñe bôte jabe na be ne bôte ya Israél.
Guiziga: Mizli mumoko ti Tel-Mela,Tel-Harsa, ti Kerup, ti Adaŋ waɗ ti Imer na, muy taŋhay ati dideˀ taŋ mizileheye, i Israyeley kwa mbrike na, taŋ a sinaka gu ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Woodi boo warɓe diga Tel-Melaha e Tel-Harsa e Kerub-Addan e Immer, ɓe mbaawaay wi'ugo to ci'e maɓɓe iwi haa Isra'iila malla naa non.
Fulfulde_DC: Woodi boo warɓe diga Tel-Melaha e Tel-Harsa e Kerub-Addan e Immer, ɓe mbaawaay wi'ugo to ci'e maɓɓe iwi haa Isra'iila malla naa non.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ Tɛl-Mɛla, nɛ Tɛl-Harsa, nɛ Kɛrub, nɛ Adaŋ in Imɛr nɛ nyɛm so mɛ iŋ‘e nutua ko dáà kɔ‘i in dùk kɔ‘i nɛ  Israɛl  na,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɛ tɛ̀ɛ́ nɛ̀ Tɛl-Mɛla, nɛ Tɛl-Harsa, nɛ Kɛrub, nɛ Adaŋ in Imɛr nɛ nyɛm so mɛ iŋ‘e nutua ko dáà kɔ‘i in dùk kɔ‘i nɛ  Israɛl  na,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi mbeli nyi kezhɛneke geva nyi se mbe yɛ Tɛl-Mɛla, Tɛl-Harsha, Kerəwb, Adan le Imɛr, nyi keshaŋe kageze ghena tiɗiɗi te hwelefe ta ka shihɛ nci kezha ncɛ kenza nde kaka Israyɛl hɛ:
Tupurri: Mokay la diñ keege jar maga sen hoo wo le Tel-Mela, Tel-Harsa, Kerub-Adam wo de Imer ga kaçaç wo ma kañ nen jar go ti feele äaaran wo de wer mani äaaran ma kañ nen jar go pah ga saara diñ jar Israyel cwaçy gaa mono. AÀ wo diñ:

Francais: les fils de Dalaïas, les fils de Tobie, les fils de Nécoda, six cent cinquante-deux.
Anglais: The children of Delaiah, the children of Tobiah, the children of Nekoda, six hundred fifty and two.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Delaya, gurona vi Tobiya, gurona vi Nekoda: Kis-karkiya kalam dok-vasl yam ma'.
Bulu: Bone be Delaya, bone be Tôbiya, bone be Nékôda: mintet misaman, mewôm metan a bebaé.
Guiziga: Taŋ jom gar na: skat skat merkeɗ ti kukur zlum nga cuw. I dideˀ ngi Delayahay, ngi Tobiyahay, waɗ ngi Nekodahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɗum danygol Delaya e Tobiya e Nekoda, worɓe teemeɗɗe njoweego e cappanɗe njowo e ɗiɗo (652).
Fulfulde_DC: Ɗum danygol Delaya e Tobiya e Nekoda, worɓe teemeɗɗe njoweego e cappanɗe njowo e ɗiɗo (652).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Delaya, ko Tobiya in ko Nɛkɔda: dɔka wa nɛ́ 652.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nɛ́ o bíí nú-gara ko Delaya, ko Tobiya in ko Nɛkɔda: dɔka wa nɛ́ 652.
Kapsiki_DC: ma pɛtɛa nci ne, gwəmsə ŋkwaŋe ba'a mcɛfemsə bakeghəmbe kaka hwelefe ta yɛ Delaya, Tobiya le Nekoda.
Tupurri: Jar ni Delaya wo, jar ni Tobiya wo, jar ni Nekoda, wo äuy kiskis hiira' ti äe do dwee ti äoge.

Francais: Et parmi les fils des prêtres : les fils de Hobia, les fils d'Accos, les fils de Berzellaï, qui avait pris pour femme une des filles de Berzellaï, le Galaadite, et fut appelé de leur nom.
Anglais: And of the children of the priests: the children of Habaiah, the children of Koz, the children of Barzillai; which took a wife of the daughters of Barzillai the Gileadite, and was called after their name:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar gurona vi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna; gurona vi Habaya, gurona vi Hakkos, gurona vi Barzilay, ma sli cata jar guro-boyna vi Barzilay, ma Galaadna, ma yum hiɗi semda visiya.
Bulu: Mfaʼa ya bone betuni: bone bʼAbaya, bone bʼAkôt, bone be Barsilayi, nye a nga luʼu ngone jia ya bengon be Barsilayi, môte ya Galad a nga yôban jôé dap.
Guiziga: Mekelemey a wuzla masayay, a sinaka dideˀ taŋhay vuna ta ya: i dideˀ ngi Hobayahay, ngi Hakos waɗ ngi Barzilayay. Mazilaka mbur hana Barzilay na, asi naŋ muzuɓ zuŋ ngi Barzilay, mbur ngi ruwuy Galaˀat.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Caka liman'en boo: Danygol Hobaya e danygol Koos e danygol Barjillay. Kamɓe, kaaka maɓɓe te'uno debbo nder danygol Barjillay mo Gile'at, o inndinaama boo Barjillay.
Fulfulde_DC: Caka liman'en boo: Danygol Hobaya e danygol Koos e danygol Barjillay. Kamɓe, kaaka maɓɓe te'uno debbo nder danygol Barjillay mo Gile'at, o inndinaama boo Barjillay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛka o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, tɛ nú-gara ko Hobaya, ko Hakɔs in ko Barzilai a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ hegɔ mbɛt. Barzilai bó nɛ́ mgbák nin-a na. A̧ baa so nɛ́ nin for-aa nɛ duka so nɛ́ ŋma be Galad.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛka o ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, tɛ nú-gara ko Hobaya, ko Hakɔs in ko Barzilai a̧a̧ so sɛnɛ hegɔ mbɛt. Barzilai bó nɛ́ mgbák nin-a na. A̧ baa so nɛ́ nin for-aa nɛ duka so nɛ́ ŋma be Galad.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kweci hwa ka dzeghe Shala: hwelefe ta yɛ Hobaya, Hakos ba'a Barzilay hɛ. Ma nda hekate nda slə mbeli kala nya ke nde keɗaŋe ne, va nya wəmeve kwete ŋkɛ hwa ŋwalea kwɛa Barzilay nya kande Gala'ad.
Tupurri: Day yoo jar sië jagn wo mono diñ jar ni Habaya wo, jar ni Hakos wo, jar ni Barsilayi maga hay da waçy yoo mayre mani Barsilayi je Galaadn wo day aè ëen de ëu äe mono.

Francais: Ils cherchèrent leur titre attestant leurs généalogies, mais on ne le trouva point; ils furent déclarés impurs et exclus du sacerdoce,
Anglais: These sought their register among those that were reckoned by genealogy, but they were not found: therefore were they, as polluted, put from the priesthood.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi gar semda vi jafna vi sumaysiya, may nisi fa'ɗi. Nala nisi patsi goy hay lop ma ɗifinna,
Bulu: Be nga jeñe môé map éndan ya Israél été ve be nji ke yene me. Ajô te be nga bili ateʼe ya beta bo ésaé ane betuni.
Guiziga: Mizli, a sipaka ɗerewol ngi slimiɗ ngi dideˀ taŋhaya gar gar, ko a lumaka ta, joˀ mizli a puraka taŋ i misi dilihey, yo a tikaka taŋ ɓa a gam slra ngi mikuli ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Liman'en ɓe'e ɗaɓɓiti inɗe muuɗum'en nder defte asli muuɗum'en, ammaa ɓe tawaay ɗe. Ngam maajum ɓe ngurtinaama kuugal limanku.
Fulfulde_DC: Liman'en ɓe'e ɗaɓɓiti inɗe muuɗum'en nder defte asli muuɗum'en, ammaa ɓe tawaay ɗe. Ngam maajum ɓe ngurtinaama kuugal limanku.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i kia so mɔ zaŋ kalata tugun nam kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa kpa nin-wa na. Hegɔ ɓɛɛ o bíí fo wa yinɛ tɛ tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧, wen wa'e war-tɛ-wa sa̧ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i kia so mɔ zaŋ kalata tugun nam kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa kpa nin-wa na. Hegɔ ɓɛɛ o bíí fo wa yinɛ tɛ tom-ɗafa-sɔ̧, wen wa'e war-tɛ-wa sa̧ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Cape mbeli nyighɛ kazele palepa nya rafete sləa ka shihɛ nci mbe, ama kekemave hɛ we. Tagha gɛ, pa mbeli zhɛrete hɛ kambeli nyi wale wale, kafɛa hɛ mbeli kemene slene ta ka dzeghe Shala.
Tupurri: Saara kië wer mani äaara no, ama saara da' ra gaè. AÈ raw nii rage go ti siigi jag no.

Francais: et le gouverneur leur interdit de manger des choses très saintes, jusqu'à ce qu'un prêtre se levât pour consulter Dieu par l'Urim et le Thummim.
Anglais: And the Tirshatha said unto them, that they should not eat of the most holy things, till there stood up a priest with Urim and with Thummim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa ma guverner di tisiya kay nisi ma ti slen ma peldetnaɗi, say mul-ma-ɗifinna mara kep job Urim* hiɗi Tumim tuwa.
Bulu: Nde njôô wop a nga jô be na be bo te di biôm bia dañ étyi akekui ntuni a yemelaneya jame te a zene ya mboon asimba .
Guiziga: Buy miwi li a ɓa taŋ anja a zumam gwat ngi mikuli mipal wãˀ na ta, hã masay a pura Urim ati Turime ɗagay far.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ngomna wi'i ɓe taa ɓe nyaama kuuje ɓurɗe senaago, sey to limanjo mawɗo ta'i haala ka'a bee Uriima e Tumiima .
Fulfulde_DC: Ngomna wi'i ɓe taa ɓe nyaama kuuje ɓurɗe senaago, sey to limanjo mawɗo ta'i haala ka'a bee Uriima e Tumiima .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wi-duk-zu-nù dora nyɔŋmɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nú-wa hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ Urim in Tumim sɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wi-duk-zu-nù dora nyɔŋmɔ-ɗafi-sɔ̧ nú-wa hɔ ŋgimbi nɛ ŋma wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ tɛ zɔk mɔ nɛ Urim in Tumim sɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa ŋgwamna le ghəa ŋkɛ gezete nda ke hɛ yagha hɛ tezeme wəshi gəmə nyi keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Shala pa te və nya tekelete zəzə nde dzeghe Shala kanewe laka kwasheghediɗia yɛ Əwrim le Təwmim.
Tupurri: Wañ ma ti progn raw riñ rage ga aà mo ree wo feçeçre ma bay ëag has hasn wo wa ëa say je sië jag po mo wii jag Urim wo de Tumim wo ëa.

Francais: L'assemblée tout entière était de quarante-deux mille trois cent soixante personnes,
Anglais: The whole congregation together was forty and two thousand three hundred and threescore,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sumun tapay noŋ pet birim dok-fiɗi yam ma' hiɗi kis-ɦidi kalam dok-karkiya,
Bulu: Ekôane bôt ése é mbe bôte toyini mewôm menyin a ébaé mintet mila a mewôm mesaman.
Guiziga: Mizli Israyeley mumoko, taŋ jom gar na: mizli durmuk kukur mufaɗ nga cuw, ti skat skat makir ti kukur merkeɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal yimɓe jama'aare fuu waɗi ujine cappanɗe nayo e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweego (42.360).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal yimɓe jama'aare fuu waɗi ujine cappanɗe nayo e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweego (42.360).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Giiwi nɛ mɔi̧a lɛŋ nɛ 42.360.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Giiwi nɛ mɔi̧a lɛŋ nɛ 42.360.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma jikə ta ka Israyɛl nyi kezhɛneke geva se mbe meleme nyi fəghe hɛ mbeli ne, mbeli 42.360,
Tupurri: Ngaäa jarn äuy hay ndar do naa ti äog ti äe kiskis swa' de jar do hiira'a.

Francais: sans compter leurs serviteurs et leurs servantes, qui étaient au nombre de sept mille trois cent trente-sept; parmi eux se trouvaient deux cents chanteurs et chanteuses.
Anglais: Beside their servants and their maids, of whom there were seven thousand three hundred thirty and seven: and there were among them two hundred singing men and singing women.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sa sunda sa jufayna hiɗi sa boyna ka ir birim siɗiya hiɗi kis-ɦidi kalam dok-ɦidi yam siɗiya may ŋaɓay hayɗi. Jarsiya sa gi nulla, jufayna hiɗi boyna kaf kis-ma';
Bulu: Te lañe bebo bisaé bap: befam a binga bôte toyini zamgbwa, mintete mila, mewôm mela a zamgbwa. Beyia bia be mbe mintet mibaé: befam a binga;
Guiziga: Migi slra taŋhay ada, mizile ati mongosohoyo: durmuk tarnaˀ ti skat skat makir ti kukur makir nga tarnaˀa, amma a slufaka taŋ a wuzla taŋ ta. Tˀada ti mizli dimisey, mizile ati mongosohoy ma: skat skat cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngoodi maccuɓe e horɓe nder jama'aare. Limgal maɓɓe waɗi ujine njoweeɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe tato e njoweeɗiɗo (7.337). Ɓe ngoodi boo yimooɓe worɓe e rewɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (200).
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngoodi maccuɓe e horɓe nder jama'aare. Limgal maɓɓe waɗi ujine njoweeɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe tato e njoweeɗiɗo (7.337). Ɓe ngoodi boo yimooɓe worɓe e rewɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (200).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wiwii in o kó-de-tom kɔ-wa bo zaŋ-aa na. Wa nɛ́ bíí 7.337. O wiwii in o kó-bii-gima nɛ́ 200.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wiwii in o kó-de-tom kɔ-wa bo zaŋ-aa na. Wa nɛ́ bíí 7.337. O wiwii in o kó-bii-gima nɛ́ 200.
Kapsiki_DC: kaɗema mbeli keɓelate ka mene slene ta nci nyi 7.337 kazhili le mi. Ka gha cimə gwəmsə bake nyi kazhili le nyi kami ya va hɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ bay de kee gebere ma twerpiirin wo de ma tnaaren wo ni wa, saara ndar renam ti äe kiskis swa' de jar do swa' ti rename. Jar 'waë siñ wo naare ma 'wad siñ wo yoo äaara ni kiskis äoge.

Francais: Ils avaient sept cent trente-six chevaux, deux cent quarante-cinq mulets,
Anglais: Their horses were seven hundred thirty and six; their mules, two hundred forty and five;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: nisi ka hiɗi kulumayn kis-siɗiya kalam dok-ɦidi yam karkiya; kulumay-kuron kis-ma' kalam dok-fiɗi yam vasl;
Bulu: be mbe be bili bikabela mintet zamgbwa, mewôm mela a bisaman, bemulé mintet mibaé, mewôm menyin a betan;
Guiziga: Pilis taŋhaya: skat skat tarnaˀ ti kukur makir nga merkeɗ, pilis zunguhoyo: skat skat cuw ti kukur mufaɗ nga zlum,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngoodi pucci teemeɗɗe joweeɗiɗi e cappanɗe tati e joweego (736) e alfadariije teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e cappanɗe nayi e jowi (245)
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngoodi pucci teemeɗɗe joweeɗiɗi e cappanɗe tati e joweego (736) e alfadariije teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e cappanɗe nayi e jowi (245)
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O dɔka nyaŋa nɛ́ 736, o sunda nɛ́ 245,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O dɔka nyaŋa nɛ́ 736, o sunda nɛ́ 245,
Kapsiki_DC: Yɛ gədəwəa nci ne, 736. Yɛ gədəwə kwara lɛmə: 245,
Tupurri: Piiiri wo kiskis renam ti äe do swa' ti hiira'a, gerheçeçre wayla wo kiskis äog ti äe do naa ti dwee,

Francais: quatre cent trente-cinq chameaux et six mille sept cent vingt ânes.
Anglais: Their camels, four hundred thirty and five; their asses, six thousand seven hundred and twenty.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: lamgan kis-fiɗi kalam dok-ɦidi yam vasl, kuron birim karkiya hiɗi kis-siɗiya kalam dok-ma' may.
Bulu: bekamel mintet minyin, mewôm mela a betan, a bijakas toyini ésaman, mintet zamgbwa a mewôm mebaé.
Guiziga: zlogomo taŋhaya: skat skat mufaɗ ti kukur makir nga zlum, zunguhoyo: durmuk merkeɗ ti skat skat tarnaˀ ti kukur cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e geelooɗi teemeɗɗe nayi e cappanɗe tati e jowi (435) e bamɗe ujine joweego e teemeɗɗe joweeɗiɗi e noogas (6.720).
Fulfulde_DC: e geelooɗi teemeɗɗe nayi e cappanɗe tati e jowi (435) e bamɗe ujine joweego e teemeɗɗe joweeɗiɗi e noogas (6.720).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o ŋgeloba nɛ́ 435, ɓɛɛ o tuifuu nɛ́ 6.720.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o ŋgeloba nɛ́ 435, ɓɛɛ o tuifuu nɛ́ 6.720.
Kapsiki_DC: zlegweməa lɛmə: gwəmsə wəfaɗe ba'a mahekenemsə mcɛfeghəmbe ba'a kwara lɛmə: 6.720.
Tupurri: yoñyoñ wo kiskis naa ti äe do swa' ti dwee, gerheçeçre wo ndar hiira' ti äe kiskis renam de gerheçeçre do äoge.

Francais: Plusieurs des chefs de famille, en arrivant à la maison de Yahweh, qui est à Jérusalem, firent des offrandes volontaires pour la maison de Dieu, afin qu'on la relevât à sa place.
Anglais: And some of the chief of the fathers, when they came to the house of the  Lord  which is at Jerusalem, offered freely for the house of God to set it up in his place:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa ŋulona vi jafna ŋolo, hay li ma nisi co hay ziyna vi Ma-Vatɗina hay Yerusalem, nisi li vulda kuɗ minda kay ziyda vi Lawna, kay na' ma in gaa hay baŋala' ma jewna.
Bulu: Abui betebʼôsu ya menda me bôt be nga bo mimvean avalʼane nlem wo kômbô asu nda Zambe, éyoñ be nga kui e Yérusalém, nalé nda éte ja ye beta kômban e vôm é tele.
Guiziga: Ti taŋ mindilam angi li ngi hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ a Zeruzalem na, cah a wuzla buy ngi hay taŋhay, a vulam gwat ngi mongoy taŋ, vur hay ngi Buymisemuŋ, ɓa a ndira kaˀ ar li naŋ a muŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde ɓe njotti nokkuure haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa Urusaliima, woɗɓe caka baaba-ci'e'en ndokki caahuuji ngam nyiɓtugo haykaliiru Allah.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde ɓe njotti nokkuure haykaliiru Jawmiraawo haa Urusaliima, woɗɓe caka baaba-ci'e'en ndokki caahuuji ngam nyiɓtugo haykaliiru Allah.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ wa hɔɔ nɛnɛ tɛ Tua ko GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm, o ŋma gasawi nutua ha̧a̧ mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ wen Tua ko GASA WAN, wen ɗafa-a e oi-aa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ wa hɔɔ nɛnɛ tɛ Tua ko GASA WAN sɛn Jerusalɛm, o ŋma gasawi nutua ha̧a̧ mɔ nɛ ta-tɛ wen Tua ko GASA WAN, wen ɗafa-a e oi-aa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa ntsehe hɛ mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm, meleme nya nza ghɛa Mahwətə mbe, pa kweci mbeli nyi te ghəa hwelefe fəke wəshi gəmə kezha zhɛne kaŋa ghɛa Shala te ŋkwa nya se ŋkɛ vəashi.
Tupurri: Wañre ma ti feele wo ngaäa haç wo haçge de dage wo de maga saara wo go Jerusalem jag tiñ mani Manwurn mono. AÀ haç wo ra ma joñre tiñ Baa no nen maga aà mo fer go booge ti ngeel äe.

Francais: Ils donnèrent au trésor de l'oeuvre, selon leurs moyens, soixante et un mille dariques d'or, cinq mille mines d'argent, et cent tuniques sacerdotales.
Anglais: They gave after their ability unto the treasure of the work threescore and one thousand drams of gold, and five thousand pound of silver, and one hundred priests' garments.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi vul kay lopna kuɗ donota visiya, gurju ma ora birim dok-karkiya yam kep, gurju ma doorona birim vasl, sligar ma li ɗifinna kis may.
Bulu: Be nga bo mimvean asu nkobe melôñ, môt ase abim ane ngule jé é né: bedram be or toyini mewôm mesaman a jia, bemine be argent toyini étan a melôʼô ntet asu betuni.
Guiziga: A vulam migidaŋ taŋ ng'ar hay ngi wi vu ti gwat puɗaway vur slra: ɓiri tapasl tapasl durmuk kukur merkeɗ ngaŋ kaˀ, yo ɓiri bara, kilo durmuk cuw ti skat skat zlum, waɗ jibe ngi masayay skata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ko ɓe ndokki fodde baawal maɓɓe: Ceede kaŋŋeeri ujine cappanɗe joweego e go'o (61.000) e cardi kilo ujine tati e teemeɗɗe joweeɗiɗi (3.700) e toggooje limanku teemerre (100).
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ko ɓe ndokki fodde baawal maɓɓe: Ceede kaŋŋeeri ujine cappanɗe joweego e go'o (61.000) e cardi kilo ujine tati e teemeɗɗe joweeɗiɗi (3.700) e toggooje limanku teemerre (100).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ mɔ wen tom ko Sɔ̧ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ kɔ-wa; duka nɛ́ kilo lɔr 61.000, kilo bu-mbɔi 5.000 ká bá nɛ̀ gba-laa ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ 100.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ mɔ wen tom ko Sɔ̧ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ kpaamɔ kɔ-wa; duka nɛ́ kilo lɔr 61.000, kilo bu-mbɔi 5.000 ká bá nɛ̀ gba-laa ko wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ 100.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ keleke kala berete ta nci: dəɓərə nyi le mze kwa tere tere 61.000 ba'a kiləwəa mze kwa ghwə ghwə 2.500, zhɛne, pa hɛ fəke lekwesa ta ka dzeghe Shala gwəmsə.
Tupurri: Saara haç ma kay joñren do maga eegre äaara kaçaç nono, haç wo boo biñni ndar do hiira' ti boñ de boo solay nen klew ndar äog ti äe kiskis dwee, oçoçbe jar sië jag wo ni kis boñ lay.

Francais: C'est ainsi que les prêtres et les lévites, des gens du peuple, les chantres, les portiers et les Nathinéens s'établirent dans leurs villes ; et tout Israël habita dans ses villes.
Anglais: So the priests, and the Levites, and some of the people, and the singers, and the porters, and the Nethinims, dwelt in their cities, and all Israel in their cities.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Muliyan-sa-ɗifinna hiɗi sa Levitna, sum sa ɦawana, sa gi nulla, sa ŋom vun-ziyna, hiɗi sa Netiniyena, lak hay hoyok-ziyna visiya, sa Israyella ka lak hay hoyok-ziyna visiya kaw.
Bulu: Ane betuni a bone be Lévi, bone be bôt, beyia bia, bebaʼale mimbé a Benétinieñ be nga tabe e bitisone biap, a bone bʼIsraéle fe e bitisone biap.
Guiziga: Akẽh na, masayay, levihey, Israyeley cah, mizli mazlam dimisey, mijigina mizlingrehey, waɗ gawla migi slraˀahaya, a pam ar walahay muvulaka taŋ di. Israyeley gar, a pam ar walahay taŋhaya so.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Liman'en e Lewi'en e yimɓe woɗɓe e yimooɓe e aynooɓe dammuɗe e huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru njooɗi nder berniiji muuɗum'en, bana nii Isra'iila'en fuu njooɗi nder berniiji muuɗum'en .
Fulfulde_DC: Liman'en e Lewi'en e yimɓe woɗɓe e yimooɓe e aynooɓe dammuɗe e huuwooɓe kuuɗe pamare nder haykaliiru njooɗi nder berniiji muuɗum'en, bana nii Isra'iila'en fuu njooɗi nder berniiji muuɗum'en .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, o ŋma bíí sɛn mgbara dukbíí, o wi-pɛm-tua in o wi-de-tom sii ɗoŋ de ye mgbák kuti ye kɔ-wa so nɛti. Hegɔ,  Israɛl  lɛŋ sii ɗoŋ tɛ o ye kɔ‘i nɛti.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o be Levii, o ŋma bíí sɛn mgbara dukbíí, o wi-pɛm-tua in o wi-de-tom sii ɗoŋ de ye mgbák kuti ye kɔ-wa so nɛti. Hegɔ,  Israɛl  lɛŋ sii ɗoŋ tɛ o ye kɔ‘i nɛti.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ka dzeghe Shala, ka Lɛvi, kwete bela ta mbeli, ka gha cimə, ka ya degha ba'a ka mene slene mbe ghɛa Shala ne, mbe meleme ta nci nzanji hɛ. Ma kweci ka Israyɛl ne, mbe meleme ta ka shihɛnyɛ hɛ nzanji hɛ.
Tupurri: Jar sië jagn wo, jar Lefidn wo, jar ma yoo ngaäan wo, jar 'wad siñn wo, jar gor jag faagen wo, jar Netiniyeçeçn wo de jar Israyel wo äuy kal wo lagge go äi leege äaaran wo.

Francais: Le septième mois étant arrivé, et les enfants d'Israël étant établis dans les villes, le peuple s'assembla comme un seul homme à Jérusalem.
Anglais: And when the seventh month was come, and the children of Israel were in the cities, the people gathered themselves together as one man to Jerusalem.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Til ma siɗiyan coowa, sum sa Israyella ka hay hoyok-ziyna visiya visiya. Sumun tok tuwsi ki sa kep ɦawa nala hay Yerusalem.
Bulu: Ngone zamgbwale é nga kui a bone bʼIsraél be nga too e bitisone biap. Nde bôte bese be nga sulan e Yérusalém ane môte wua.
Guiziga: Israyeley a cifam le ar walahay taŋhaya. Kiya mitarnaˀ naŋ ngi vi mindilo na, a kusom ti mevel purla a Zeruzaleme.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nde lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru waɗi, Isra'iila'en jooɗiiɓe nder berniiji muuɗum'en mooɓi haa Urusaliima bana goɗɗo gooto.
Fulfulde_DC: Nde lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru waɗi, Isra'iila'en jooɗiiɓe nder berniiji muuɗum'en mooɓi haa Urusaliima bana goɗɗo gooto.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ zɛ girwɔ hɔɔ nɛnɛ, ká o be  Israɛl  a̧a̧ tɛ o ye kɔ‘i, dukbíí lɛŋ mɔi̧a sɛn Jerusalɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ŋgimbi nɛ zɛ girwɔ hɔɔ nɛnɛ, ká o be  Israɛl  a̧a̧ tɛ o ye kɔ‘i, dukbíí lɛŋ mɔi̧a sɛn Jerusalɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa dzembe kwa mberefaŋe ta tere mbeli mbe va ne, pɛtɛ ka Israyɛl nyi kese mbe meleme ta nci tsenete geva kanya kwetɛŋe mbe Zhɛrəzalɛm.
Tupurri: Few ma de renam wo kolge mokay jar Israyel hay wo go äi leege äaaran wo. Jarn raw wo tayge go äuy Jerusalem do jobo boñ nono.

Francais: Josué, fils de Josédec, avec ses frères, les prêtres, et Zorobabel, fils de Salathiel, avec ses frères, se levèrent et bâtirent l'autel du Dieu d'Israël pour y offrir des holocaustes, selon ce qui est écrit dans la loi de Moïse, l'homme de Dieu.
Anglais: Then stood up Jeshua the son of Jozadak, and his brethren the priests, and Zerubbabel the son of Shealtiel, and his brethren, and builded the altar of the God of Israel, to offer burnt offerings thereon, as it is written in the law of Moses the man of God.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Yosuwa goora vi Yotsadak, hiɗi ɓosiyomna muliyan-sa-ɗifinna, hiɗi Zorobabel goora vi Seyaltiyel, hiɗi ɓosiyomna yaway kulo'o, nisi in giwin-ma-ɗifinna vi Lawna vi Israyel, kay li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyn kalamu, ki nam ka doy hay gatta vi Musus sana vi Lawna nala.
Bulu: Ane Yasua mone Yôtsadak a bobenyañe bé betuni, nalé fe Zôrôbabél mone Séaltiél a bobenyañe bé, be nga kôlô si a lôñe ataʼa metunaʼa Zambe yʼIsraél asu mimvean mi ne ngum avalʼane é ne ntilan e kalate metiñe Môze, môta Zambe.
Guiziga: Yesuwa masay, mangal ngi Yosadak ati sukum naŋ masayaya, waɗ Zorobabel, mangal ngi Seyaltiyel ati sukum naŋhaya, a zlaka ndira li gi mikuli da Buymisemuŋ ngi Israyele, ɓa a gam mikuli mizlam zlam anga, kaɓa mutohoko ɓi naŋ angi ɓimujuwa ngi Moyis, mbur ngi Buymisemuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yeesu'a ɓii Yocadak bee deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum liman'en e Zorobaabila ɓii Salatiyel bee deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum nyiɓti hirsirde ngam Allah Isra'iila, ngam haa ɓe lii'ano mo dabbaaji guleteeɗi dow maare, bana ko winnda haa tawreeta Muusa, goɗɗo Allah .
Fulfulde_DC: Yeesu'a ɓii Yocadak bee deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum liman'en e Zorobaabila ɓii Salatiyel bee deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum nyiɓti hirsirde ngam Allah Isra'iila, ngam haa ɓe lii'ano mo dabbaaji guleteeɗi dow maare, bana ko winnda haa tawreeta Muusa, goɗɗo Allah .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Josue bem ko Yosadak in o nya-a̧ nɛ ya nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in Zorobabɛl bem ko Saltiɛl in o nya-a̧ kura, ɓɛɛ wa mbo  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  ha̧ Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  wen wɛka o  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  sɛnɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ Heembea ko Moisɛ bíí ko Sɔ̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Josue bem ko Yosadak in o nya-a̧ nɛ ya nɛ́ o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ in Zorobabɛl bem ko Saltiɛl in o nya-a̧ kura, ɓɛɛ wa mbo  fara-ɗafi-sɔ̧  ha̧ Sɔ̧ ko  Israɛl  wen wɛka o  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  sɛnɛ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ mɔ nɛ yɔra zaŋ Heembea ko Moisɛ bíí ko Sɔ̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ntake yɛ Yɛshəwa, wəzege ta Yosadak sate te ŋkwa zlaɓe le kweci ka menəhɛnyɛ nyi kaka dzeghe Shala, tsagha yɛ Zorobabɛl, wəzege ta Shɛyaltiyɛl le kweci ka menəhɛnyɛ, kezha ŋa reghwetɛa Shala ta ka Israyɛl yitea dzeghe nda yɛ melɛ kwa tere tere mbeli te kala nya kerafete geva mbe wəsə mahalegəa Moyize, nya kawəndəa Shala.
Tupurri: Josuwe je ni Yotsadagn wo de heçeçre äe jar sië jag wo, Sorobabel je ni Sealtiyeln wo de heçeçre äen kal wo hooge, boo wo ngeel sië jag mani Baa ma Israyel no, ma joñ siëgi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy wo ti äe do maga aà de yerge äil jag liñgi mani Moyis je mani Baan nono.

Francais: Ils établirent l'autel sur ses anciens fondements, car ils étaient dans la terreur devant les peuples du pays, et ils y offrirent des holocaustes à Yahweh, les holocaustes du matin et du soir.
Anglais: And they set the altar upon his bases; for fear was upon them because of the people of those countries: and they offered burnt offerings thereon unto the  Lord , even burnt offerings morning and evening.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi in giwin-ma-ɗifinna hay baŋalamu, kay nisi ka li nar kay sum sa hay liyna, nisi li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna tam Ma-Vatɗina, ɗifin ma ŋal goyna ma graw culumta hiɗi ma vulatita.
Bulu: Nde be nga beta telé ataʼa metunaʼa te e mbôkaʼa wé yôp, amu be nga ko e bôt be nga koone be valé woñ, ajô te be nga ve Nti mimvean mi ne ngum ataʼa metunaʼa te yôp.
Guiziga: Ko ti taŋ mazluwunam ti mizli mekelemey mipam asi ruwuyo tekeɗe kwana, a ɗiyaka li gi mikuli cummo ar virzi naŋ misi zleˀe vuna si, a gaka mikuli mizlam zlam da Bumbulvuŋ, i mikuli mizlam zlam magaka ti miprik waɗ ti pastaˀa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ndarni hirsirde dow caɓɓaaje haa nde darino naane koo to ɓe ɗon kula ummaatooje lesdi man. Dow hirsirde man ɓe lii'ani Jawmiraawo guleteeɗi, fajiri e kiikiiɗe fuu .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ndarni hirsirde dow caɓɓaaje haa nde darino naane koo to ɓe ɗon kula ummaatooje lesdi man. Dow hirsirde man ɓe lii'ani Jawmiraawo guleteeɗi, fajiri e kiikiiɗe fuu .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kíì o bíí nù‘i de wa dee mbɛt, ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ mboo fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧‘i sɛn oi fara'i. Wa wɛka  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  hi̧i̧ ha̧ GASA WAN; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  wan mɛ tuyɛ in mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kíì o bíí nù‘i de wa dee mbɛt, ɓɛɛ kɔ-wa kànà nɛ́ mboo fara-dɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧‘i sɛn oi fara'i. Wa wɛka  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  hi̧i̧ ha̧ GASA WAN; mɛ̀ nɛ́ o  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  wan mɛ tuyɛ in mɛ ga̧a̧mɔ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ya ghazlənə nza kazhɛ nda ke hɛ va mbeli nyi te hɛɗia shɛ ne, pa hɛ ŋate reghwetɛa shɛ te shihəa ŋkɛ nya vəashi shanda. Ntake hɛ kadzeghe nda yɛ melɛ kwa tere tere te ke Mahwətə masheke le tɛhwɛɗi.
Tupurri: Saara fer boo ngeel sië jagn ti ngeel äe werga aà hay wo go de caa heçeçne do jar ma äil sirn wo ni. Saara raw joñ siëgi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy wo ne Manwuri, joñ wo siëgi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuy ma de jag toñn wo de ma de lawn wo.

Francais: Ils célébrèrent la fête des Tabernacles, comme il est écrit, et ils offrirent jour par jour les holocaustes, selon le nombre prescrit par la loi pour chaque jour.
Anglais: They kept also the feast of tabernacles, as it is written, and offered the daily burnt offerings by number, according to the custom, as the duty of every day required;
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi li yuldeta vi guɗukŋa, ki nam ka ɗoy nala, nisi li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna falayta hiɗi henjet kaf, kuɗ ŋaɓta valamu ma colay hay buurta kafna.
Bulu: Be nga jeme fe abôʼô bibem avalʼane é ne ntilan, a be nga ve mimvean mi ne ngum môs ane môs avalʼane tañ ja yiane môs ôse é né.
Guiziga: Yo Israyeley a gam muguzlum ngi Guɗuk, kaɓa mutohoko ɓi naŋ. A ra gam mikuli mizlam zlama vur hin gar, kaɓa sirik taŋ muɗuva gi naŋ angi hiipasa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe mbaɗi boo Juulde Bukkaaji bana ko winnda, nyalaade fuu ɓe lii'i guleteeɗi fodde limgal man bana ko umra .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe mbaɗi boo Juulde Bukkaaji bana ko winnda, nyalaade fuu ɓe lii'i guleteeɗi fodde limgal man bana ko umra .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dee gbaŋa Tua-laa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yɔra ga, wɛk nɛ  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka-a nɛ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ ha̧ so.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dee gbaŋa Tua-laa hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ yɔra ga, wɛk nɛ  dɔɔ-kpoo-sɔ̧  dam ɗoŋ wese lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka-a nɛ‘i tɛ̀ɛ́ ha̧ so.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, ntake hɛ kamene gəsəkəa yɛ ghwəli kala nya kerafete geva. Keveci keveci dzeghe melɛ kwa tere tere hɛ kala nya 'yɛwete wəsə keshi te vəghwə.
Tupurri: Saara raw joñ few mburyugn wo do maga aà de yerge nono, day saara joñ siëgi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuyn wo tum ti naw do maga aà de ngaäge ga aè nen joñge äe äaale no kay nen naw ka' no mono.

Francais: Après cela, ils offrirent l'holocauste perpétuel, les holocaustes des néoménies et de toutes les fêtes consacrées à Yahweh, et ceux de quiconque faisait une offrande volontaire à Yahweh.
Anglais: And afterward offered the continual burnt offering, both of the new moons, and of all the set feasts of the  Lord  that were consecrated, and of every one that willingly offered a freewill offering unto the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bugol kayni, nisi li ɗifin ma ŋal dok-dokŋa, ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna ma kay til ma wulina, hiɗi buur ma yuldeta ma vuli goy tam Ma-Vatɗin kafna, hiɗi sum sarige kaf sa li vulda kuɗ minda tam Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Mvuse ya valé, be nga ve fe mimvean mi ne ngum mia veban éyoñ ése, a mimvean mi ne ngum asu metéé me ngon a asu mebôʼô mese a mi ba ve Nti avalʼane nlem wo kômbô.
Guiziga: A dirba nah, a gam mikuli mindrehhe, mikuli mizlam zlamay ngi kiya muslo le, waɗ ngi hin ngi muguzlumoy mihĩˀĩ ngi Bumbulvuŋ ati ngi mizli gar mavulam gwat ngi mongoy taŋ da Bumbulvuŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓaawoɗon boo nguleteeŋga nyalaade nyalaade e guleteeɗi e dokke ngam juulde lewru hesru e ngam juulɗe goɗɗe cenaaɗe ngam Jawmiraawo, non boo caahuuji ɗi goɗɗo waddani Jawmiraawo .
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓaawoɗon boo nguleteeŋga nyalaade nyalaade e guleteeɗi e dokke ngam juulde lewru hesru e ngam juulɗe goɗɗe cenaaɗe ngam Jawmiraawo, non boo caahuuji ɗi goɗɗo waddani Jawmiraawo .
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ wan mɛ wese lɛŋ; ɓɛɛ zu-a'i, wa tɛɛ dɔ wan mɛ mbe yí-zɛ in o wan mɛ wese gbaŋa ko GASA WAN, ká bá nɛ̀ o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ bíí ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ ta-tɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa dɔɔ kpoo-sɔ̧ wan mɛ wese lɛŋ; ɓɛɛ zu-a'i, wa tɛɛ dɔ wan mɛ mbe yí-zɛ in o wan mɛ wese gbaŋa ko GASA WAN, ká bá nɛ̀ o ha̧a̧mɔ nɛ bíí ha̧ ha̧ GASA WAN nɛ ta-tɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma se te vəa shɛ ne, ntake hɛ kadzeghe melɛ kwa tere tere nya keveci keveci, yɛ melɛ kwa tere terea dzemɛa ghweme ta tere ba'a nyi kaŋa vəa gəsəkə nyi keveyi geva tekeleke kaŋa Mahwətə, tsagha kaŋa mbeli nyi kekele nda kweci wəshi gəmə le ɗe ta nci ke Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Blam äe saara raw joñ siigi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuyn ma tum tum no, joñ wo ma ti kolge fewn wo de ma ti wur fruygi maga wo go sagsag ma Manwur mono, joñ wo ma wosela äuy maga aà haç haçge de dage wo ne Manwur mono.

Francais: Dès le premier jour du septième mois, ils avaient commencé à offrir des holocaustes à Yahweh, mais les fondements du temple de Yahweh n'étaient pas encore posés.
Anglais: From the first day of the seventh month began they to offer burnt offerings unto the  Lord . But the foundation of the temple of the  Lord  was not yet laid.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hay buurta jewta vi til ma siɗiyana, nisi tun caw li ɗifin ma ŋal-goyna tam Ma-Vatɗina. May hay na'ta, sem-ziyda vi Tempella vi Ma-Vatɗina bay tun gaa tuwa.
Bulu: Eyoñe môs ôsu ya ngone zamgbwale ô nga kui, be nga taté ve Nti mimvean mi ne ngum. Ve da na valé mimbôkaʼa ya nda Zambe Nti mi ngenan te bôʼôban.
Guiziga: Zle ti hin mudumbuŋ ngi kiya mitarnaˀ naŋ si na, a zlaka gi mikuli mizlam zlam da Bumbulvuŋ. Naɓa a ɗuvaka virzi ngi hay ngi Bumbulvuŋ vuna t'aruŋ ngbaŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Diga nyannde go'oore nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru ɓe puɗɗi lii'anaago Jawmiraawo guleteeɗi, saa'i man ɓe caɓɓaayno caɓɓaaje haykaliiru tawon.
Fulfulde_DC: Diga nyannde go'oore nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru ɓe puɗɗi lii'anaago Jawmiraawo guleteeɗi, saa'i man ɓe caɓɓaayno caɓɓaaje haykaliiru tawon.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ku̧u̧ naŋ dɔɔ kpoo ha̧ GASA WAN tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ ko girwɔ; ká ŋgimbi'i wa tɛ e géé naŋ Tua ko GASA WAN hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ku̧u̧ naŋ dɔɔ kpoo ha̧ GASA WAN tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ ko girwɔ; ká ŋgimbi'i wa tɛ e géé naŋ Tua ko GASA WAN hɔ̧ɔ̧ na.
Kapsiki_DC: Te kwa ghate ta hɛa tere kwa mberefaŋe ne, pa hɛ ghate kadzeghe nda yɛ melɛ kwa tere tere ke Mahwətə, ya kwela ɗema yɛ shihəa ghɛa Mahwətə kenaka kaveyi geva.
Tupurri: Ti naw ma tañgu nen few ma de renamn mono, saara tï¡ï¡ wer joñ siëgi jag maga aè roë mo äen go äuyn ne Manwuri. Ane tiñ mani Manwurn hay bay de äo' wer wa ëa.

Francais: On donna de l'argent aux tailleurs de pierres et aux charpentiers ; on donna aussi des vivres, des boissons et de l'huile aux Sidoniens et aux Tyriens, pour qu'ils amenassent par mer jusqu'à Joppé des bois de cèdre du Liban, suivant l'autorisation qu'on avait eue de Cyrus, roi de Perse.
Anglais: They gave money also unto the masons, and to the carpenters; and meat, and drink, and oil, unto them of Zidon, and to them of Tyre, to bring cedar trees from Lebanon to the sea of Joppa, according to the grant that they had of Cyrus king of Persia.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi vul gurjuta mi sa ceɗ hiɗiyna, hiɗi sa har guna, nisi vul tina hiɗi cina hiɗi mula mi sa Sidonna hiɗi sa Tirusna, kay nisi ma yaw gu-gamna vi Libaŋ ay goloŋ hay niyna ta-ta hay Yaffa, ki Sirus mulla vi Persiya vul hagata nala.
Bulu: Ane be nga ve beba mekok a bebo mendile moné; wôna be nga ve bôte ya Sidoñ a Tir bidi, menyu a mbone na be zuu bilé bi Sédre ya Libañ bi wuluʼu e mañe mañ a kui e Yafa, avalʼane Sirus njô bôte ya Perse a nga ve ngu.
Guiziga: Waɗ ma na, a wurkaka miciɗa ɗuguroy waɗ mujuwa marjahaya, yo a vulaka gwat ngi zum, gwat ngi si waɗ mal da mizli Sidoŋhoy ati mizli Tirey, ɓa taŋ kwana, a slinoko taŋ dum ngi widis miter ngi Libaŋ tir mubuliy, hã sesẽŋ a Zafa. A gaka kanah, asi Sirus, buy ngi Perse, a vula taŋ jiviɗ nah le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe njoɓi sehooɓe kaa'e e sehooɓe leɗɗe, ɓe ndokki yimɓe Tirus e Sidon nyaamdu e njaram e nebbam, haa ɓe ngadda leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe diga Libanon dow mbeela haa Yafo, fodde ko Koores, laamiiɗo Persiya duŋani ɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe njoɓi sehooɓe kaa'e e sehooɓe leɗɗe, ɓe ndokki yimɓe Tirus e Sidon nyaamdu e njaram e nebbam, haa ɓe ngadda leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe diga Libanon dow mbeela haa Yafo, fodde ko Koores, laamiiɗo Persiya duŋani ɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ sede ha̧ o wi-sɛk-ta in o wi-gba-te ká bá nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ in o dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o nɔ̧́ ha̧ o be Sidɔŋ in Tir wen ha̧ wa mɛ kai te-gbatui Libaŋ tɛnɛ nɛ̀ zu yì hɔ Jafa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ sede ha̧ o wi-sɛk-ta in o wi-gba-te ká bá nɛ̀ o nyɔŋmɔ in o dɔ̧ɔ̧ in o nɔ̧́ ha̧ o be Sidɔŋ in Tir wen ha̧ wa mɛ kai te-gbatui Libaŋ tɛnɛ nɛ̀ zu yì hɔ Jafa nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ wen ko Sirus wannu Pɛrsɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa sebe ta ŋkɛ ne, ntake hɛ kaŋki nda cɛdɛ ke ka tsehe pelɛ le ka sla sheghwə. Zhɛne ne, kəliɓə hɛ fəave nda wəshi kezeme, wəshi kesa ba'a n'yi ke ka Sidon le ka Tir yitea fəke nda sheghwə lekelekea Liban hɛ ke hɛ jive te ndərə hwa'a mbe Jafa, kala nya ndeke nda hweŋkwa Sirəs, meghea ka Pɛrse ke hɛ.
Tupurri: AÈ raw haç solay ne jar ceë huulin wo de jar ceë kooren wo, haç reege, feçeçre jooge wo de noo wo ne jar Sidoñ wo de jar Tir wo nen maga aà mo hoo wo koore seder ma Libañ wo le ti daage, mo aà wo go de äe Jafa do maga Sirus wañ Perse hay waçaçn le nono.
