KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, wen ko o wi nɛ kaia so o ko-gɔni-duk kaɗa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Ɓɛɛ tɛ kuti ɔɔ-zɛ tɛ kuti fio-zɛ, wen ko o wi nɛ kaia so o ko-gɔni-duk kaɗa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma te kwa ghate ta hɛa tere kwa ghate ne, pa hɛ kiɗimte le mbeli nyi kewəmeve mi hwa kweci hwelefefi.
Tupurri: Ti naw ma tañgu nen few ma tañgun mokay saara mañ jag ree go de jar maga hay da wo naçaçre dehaçy wo mo äuy!

Francais: Parmi les fils des prêtres, il s'en trouva qui avaient établi chez eux des femmes étrangères, savoir : des fils de Josué, fils de Josédec, et de ses frères : Maasias, Eliézer, Jarib et Godolias ;
Anglais: And among the sons of the priests there were found that had taken strange wives: namely, of the sons of Jeshua the son of Jozadak, and his brethren; Maaseiah, and Eliezer, and Jarib, and Gedaliah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar gurona vi muliyan-sa-ɗifinna, nisi fi sum sa yaw boy sa pulla kaw: Kuɗ jafna vi Yosuwa mi goora vi Yotsadak hiɗi ɓosiyomna Maaseya, Eliyezer, Yarib hiɗi Gedaliya.
Bulu: E bone betuni été, beluʼu bengon bikuu be mbe bevoʼo ya bone be Yasua mone Yôtsadak a bevoʼo ya bone be bobenyañ: Maséya, Eliézer, Yarib, a Gedalia.
Guiziga: A wuzla masayaya, muzuɓam ngwasay, ziri mulakaya, t'ani: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Yesuwahay ati sukum naŋ, ziri ngi Yosadakaya, i ti: Maˀaseya, Eliyezer, Yarip, waɗ Gedaliya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Caka liman'en, ndaa te'ɓe ɓiɓɓe rewɓe jananɓe: Caka ɓiɓɓe Yeesu'a ɓii Yocadak e banndiraaɓe muuɗum: Ma'aseya e Eli'azaaru e Yariba e Gedaliya.
Fulfulde_DC: Caka liman'en, ndaa te'ɓe ɓiɓɓe rewɓe jananɓe: Caka ɓiɓɓe Yeesu'a ɓii Yocadak e banndiraaɓe muuɗum: Ma'aseya e Eli'azaaru e Yariba e Gedaliya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o wi nɛ kaia o ko-gɔni-duk nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Masɛya, Eliɛzɛr, Yarib ká bá nɛ̀ Gɛdalia; wa nɛ́ o bezaŋ Josue bem ko Yosadak in o nya-wi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧, o wi nɛ kaia o ko-gɔni-duk nɛ́ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: Masɛya, Eliɛzɛr, Yarib ká bá nɛ̀ Gɛdalia; wa nɛ́ o bezaŋ Josue bem ko Yosadak in o nya-wi.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hwa ka dzeghe Shala nyi kewəmeve mi hwa kweci hwelefefi ne, na mbeli kesləyi: hwa ŋwalea yɛ Zhozəwɛ nya kawəzege ta Yosadak le ka kesaka yitenyɛ: yɛ Masɛya, Ɛliyɛzɛr, Yarib le Gedaliya.
Tupurri: Yoo jar sië jagn wo mono jar ma po da wo maçyre dehaçy wo, jar sen wo diñ Maaseya, Eliyeser, Yerib wo de Gedaliya jar ni Josuwe je ni Yotsadagn wo de heçeçre äe wo.

Francais: ils donnèrent parole de renvoyer leurs femmes et, se déclarant coupables, d'offrir un bélier pour l'expiation de leur faute.
Anglais: And they gave their hands that they would put away their wives; and being guilty, they offered a ram of the flock for their trespass.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi va' tisiya kay digiɗ boyna visiya, kay li ɗifin hiɗi ŋat ɦu-gamala kep kaw kay jiw-zlata visiya.
Bulu: Be nga tiñeti na ba zu titane binga bap a ve nnôm ntômba amu mekua map;
Guiziga: A ɓam ɗaˀ ɗaˀ ti hudum, ɓa a ɓulaka ngwas taŋhaya, yo ɓa a vulam zlengerek pal ngi gi mikuli ngi ɗiya ɓi ngi mungra taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓe ngerdi seerugo rewɓe maɓɓe. Ɓe ngaddi njawdiri mbaalu ndi kirseteendi ngam aybe maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓe ngerdi seerugo rewɓe maɓɓe. Ɓe ngaddi njawdiri mbaalu ndi kirseteendi ngam aybe maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ nú mɛ ndak o kóò kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ vala sami ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa ha̧a̧ nú mɛ ndak o kóò kɔ-wa, ɓɛɛ wa ha̧ vala sami ɗafi nɛ sɔ̧ oi ɗaŋmɔ kɔ-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa hɛ zemete fela kezha ŋkamte mia nci ba'a kezha dzeghe melɛ le game kezha kelemte fete ta nci Shala te wənə.
Tupurri: Saara raw wo hoo do äaara go ciñ ma nii naare äaaran wo, ma sii jag de gamla ma por älagge äaara no.

Francais: Des fils d'Emmer : Hanani et Zébédias.
Anglais: And of the sons of Immer; Hanani, and Zebadiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ jafna vi Immer si Hanani hiɗi Zebadiya;
Bulu: ba ya bone bʼImer be nga luʼu bengone bikuu: Anani a Zebadia;
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Imereye, i ti: Hanani ati Zebadiya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Caka ɓiɓɓe Immer, ɓe'e: Hanani e Sebadiya.
Fulfulde_DC: Caka ɓiɓɓe Immer, ɓe'e: Hanani e Sebadiya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Imɛr, nɛ́ Hanani in Zɛbadia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Imɛr, nɛ́ Hanani in Zɛbadia.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ŋwalea Imɛr: yɛ Hanani le Zɛbadiya,
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Imer wo diñ Hanani wo de Sebadiya.

Francais: Des fils de Harim : Maasias, Elie, Séméïas, Jéhiel et Ozias.
Anglais: And of the sons of Harim; Maaseiah, and Elijah, and Shemaiah, and Jehiel, and Uzziah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Harim si Maaseya, Eli, Semayeya, Yehiyel hiɗi Oziyas;
Bulu: ba ya bone bʼArim: Maséya, Elie, Semaéya, Yeiél a Ozias.
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Harimeye, i ti: Maˀaseya, Eliya, Semaya, Yehiyel waɗ Uziya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Caka ɓiɓɓe Harim, ɓe'e: Ma'aseya e Eliya e Sema'ya e Yehiyel e Uzziya.
Fulfulde_DC: Caka ɓiɓɓe Harim, ɓe'e: Ma'aseya e Eliya e Sema'ya e Yehiyel e Uzziya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Harim, nɛ́ Masɛya, Elia, Sɛmaya, Yehiɛl in Uzia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Harim, nɛ́ Masɛya, Elia, Sɛmaya, Yehiɛl in Uzia.
Kapsiki_DC: hwa ŋwalea Harim: Masɛya, Ɛli, Shemaya, Yɛhiyɛl ba'a Əwziya,
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Harim wo diñ Maaseya, Semaeya, Yehiyel wo de Osiyase.

Francais: Des fils de Phashur : Elioénaï, Maasias, Ismaël, Nathanaël, Jozabed et Elasa.
Anglais: And of the sons of Pashur; Elioenai, Maaseiah, Ishmael, Nethaneel, Jozabad, and Elasah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Pakhur si Elyohenay, Maaseya, Ismayel, Netaneel, Yozabad hiɗi Eleyasa.
Bulu: Ba ya bone be Pasur: Eljoénayi, Maséya, Ismaél, Nétaniél, Yôzabad a Eléasa.
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Pasehuroyo, i ti: Eliyohenay, Maˀaseya, Ismayel, Netaneyel, Yosabat waɗ Elasa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Caka ɓiɓɓe Pashuuru, ɓe'e: Eliyo'enay e Ma'aseya e Isma'iilu e Netaneyel e Yozabat e El'aasa.
Fulfulde_DC: Caka ɓiɓɓe Pashuuru, ɓe'e: Eliyo'enay e Ma'aseya e Isma'iilu e Netaneyel e Yozabat e El'aasa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Pasɛhur, nɛ́ Ɛlyɔnai, Masɛya, Yismaɛl, Nɛtanɛl in Yozabad ká bá nɛ̀ Elɛasa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Pasɛhur, nɛ́ Ɛlyɔnai, Masɛya, Yismaɛl, Nɛtanɛl in Yozabad ká bá nɛ̀ Elɛasa.
Kapsiki_DC: hwa ŋwalea Pashehəwr: yɛ Ɛliyohɛnay, Masɛya, Ismayɛl, Netanɛyɛl, Yozabad ba'a Ɛlasa.
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Pashur wo diñ Eljoenay, Maaseya, Ismayel, Netaneel, Yosabad wo de Eleasa.

Francais: -- Parmi les lévites : Jozabed, Séméï, Célaïas, le même que Célita, Phataïas, Juda et Eliézer.- Parmi les chantres : Eliasib.
Anglais: Also of the Levites; Jozabad, and Shimei, and Kelaiah, (the same is Kelita,) Pethahiah, Judah, and Eliezer.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ jafna vi sa Levitna si Yozabad, Simey, Kelaya ma yum lo ala Kelita, Petahya, Yuda hiɗi Eliyezer.
Bulu: Ba ya bone be Lévi: Yôzabad, Siméyi, Kélaya nge na Kelita, Pétaya, Yuda a Eliézer.
Guiziga: A wuzla Leviheye, i ti: Yosabat, Simey, Kelaya, (ada zilaka Kelita ma), Petahiya, Yehuda waɗ Eliyezer.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Caka Lewi'en: Yozabat e Sim'i e Kelaya bi'eteeɗo boo Kelita e Petahiya e Yahuuda e Eli'ezer.
Fulfulde_DC: Caka Lewi'en: Yozabat e Sim'i e Kelaya bi'eteeɗo boo Kelita e Petahiya e Yahuuda e Eli'ezer.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o be Levii, nɛ́ Yozabad in Simɛi in Kelaya nɛ‘i sa'e Kelita mbɛt, in Pɛtaya in Yehuda in Eliɛzɛr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o be Levii, nɛ́ Yozabad in Simɛi in Kelaya nɛ‘i sa'e Kelita mbɛt, in Pɛtaya in Yehuda in Eliɛzɛr.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hwa ka Lɛvi ne, Yozabad, Shimɛyi, Kɛlaya nya heka mbeli zhɛkwa kaKelita, Petahiya, Yehəwda ba'a Ɛliyɛzɛr.
Tupurri: Yoo jar Lefidn wo diñ Yosabad, Simeyi, Kelaya maga aè ëen ga Kelita mono, Petahiya, Juda wo de Eliyesere.

Francais: -- Parmi les portiers : Selum, Télem et Uri.
Anglais: Of the singers also; Eliashib: and of the porters; Shallum, and Telem, and Uri.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kuɗ sa gi nulla, mi Eliyasib. Kuɗ sa ŋom vun-galana si Sallum, Telem hiɗi Uri.
Bulu: Ba ya beyia bia: Eliasib. Ba ya bebaʼale mimbé: Salum, Télém a Uri.
Guiziga: A wuzla mizli dimiseye, i: Eliyasiɓ. A wuzla mijigina mizlingreheye, i ti: Salum, Telem waɗ Uri.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Caka yimooɓe: Eliyasib. Caka aynooɓe dammuɗe: Sallum e Telem e Uuri.
Fulfulde_DC: Caka yimooɓe: Eliyasib. Caka aynooɓe dammuɗe: Sallum e Telem e Uuri.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o wi-bii-gima, nɛ́ Eliasib. Mgbara o wi-pɛm-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ́ Salum, Tɛlɛm in Uri.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o wi-bii-gima, nɛ́ Eliasib. Mgbara o wi-pɛm-nú Tua ko Sɔ̧ nɛ́ Salum, Tɛlɛm in Uri.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ka gha cimə ne, Ɛliyashib. Ma hwa ka ya degha ne, yɛ: Shaləwm, Tɛlɛm le Əwri.
Tupurri: Yoo jar 'wad siñn wo diñ Eliyakib. Yoo jar gor jag tiñ wo diñ Salum, Telem wo de Uri.

Francais: Parmi ceux d'Israël : Des fils de Pharos : Réméïas, Jézias, Melchias, Miamin, Eliézer, Melchias et Banaïas ;
Anglais: Moreover of Israel: of the sons of Parosh; Ramiah, and Jeziah, and Malchiah, and Miamin, and Eleazar, and Malchijah, and Benaiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Jar nisi sa Israyella: Jafna vi Parewos, si Ramiya, Yiziya, Malkiya, Miyamin, Eleyazar, Malkiya hiɗi Benaya;
Bulu: Ba ya bone bʼIsraél: ndaa Paréôk: Ramia, Yiziya, Malkiya, Miyamin, Eléazar, Malkiya a Benaya;
Guiziga: A wuzla Israyel mekelemeye, i dideˀ ngi Parokoy: ti Ramiya, Iziya, Malkiya, Miyamin, Elazar, Malkiya waɗ Benaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Caka yimɓe Isra'iila boo: Nder danygol Par'os, ɓe'e: Ramiya e Ijjiya e Malkiya e Miyamin e Eli'azaaru e Malkiya e Benaya.
Fulfulde_DC: Caka yimɓe Isra'iila boo: Nder danygol Par'os, ɓe'e: Ramiya e Ijjiya e Malkiya e Miyamin e Eli'azaaru e Malkiya e Benaya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: War ko o dɔka o be  Israɛl , mgbara o bezaŋ Parɔs, nɛ́ Ramia, Izia, Malkia, Miyamin, Eleazar, Malkia in Bɛnaya.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: War ko o dɔka o be  Israɛl , mgbara o bezaŋ Parɔs, nɛ́ Ramia, Izia, Malkia, Miyamin, Eleazar, Malkia in Bɛnaya.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hwa kweci ka Israyɛl ne, nahe mbeli kesləyi: hwa ŋwalea Parosh: yɛ Ramiya, Iziya, Malkiya, Miyamin, Ɛlazar, Malkiya le Benaya.
Tupurri: Yoo jar Israyel mono diñ Ramiya, Yisiya, Malkiya, Miyamin, Eleyasar, Malkiya wo de Benaya jar ni Pareos wo.

Francais: Des fils d'Elam : Mathanias, Zacharie, Jéhiel, Abdi, Jérimoth et Elie;
Anglais: And of the sons of Elam; Mattaniah, Zechariah, and Jehiel, and Abdi, and Jeremoth, and Elijah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Elam, si Mattaniya, Zakariya, Yehiyel, Abdi, Yeremot hiɗi Eli;
Bulu: ndaa Elam: Matania, Zakari, Yeiél, Abdi, Yérémôt a Elie;
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Elamay, i ti: Mataniya, Zakari, Yehiyel, Abidi, Yeremot waɗ Eliya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Elam: Mattaniya e Zekariya e Yehiyel e Abdi e Yeremot e Eliya.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Elam: Mattaniya e Zekariya e Yehiyel e Abdi e Yeremot e Eliya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Elam, nɛ́ Matania, Zakarii, Yehiɛl, Abdi, Yɛrɛmɔt ká bá nɛ̀ Elia.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Elam, nɛ́ Matania, Zakarii, Yehiɛl, Abdi, Yɛrɛmɔt ká bá nɛ̀ Elia.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ŋwalea Ɛlam: yɛ Mataniya, Zakari, Yɛhiyɛl, Abdi, Yerɛmot le Ɛli.
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Elam wo diñ Mataniya, Sakari, Yehiyel, Abdi, Yeremod wo de Eli,

Francais: des fils de Zéthua : Elioénaï, Eliasib, Mathanias, Jérimoth, Zabad et Aziza;
Anglais: And of the sons of Zattu; Elioenai, Eliashib, Mattaniah, and Jeremoth, and Zabad, and Aziza.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Zattu, si Elyohenay, Eliyasib, Mattaniya, Yeremot, Zabad hiɗi Aziza;
Bulu: ndaa Zatu: Elioénayi, Eliasib, Matania, Yérémôt, Zabad a Aziza;
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Zatuhoyo, i ti: Eliyohenay, Eliyasip, Mataniya, Yeremot, Zabat waɗ Aziza.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Zattu, ɓe'e: Eliyo'enay e Eliyasib e Mattaniya e Yeremot e Zabada e Aziza.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Zattu, ɓe'e: Eliyo'enay e Eliyasib e Mattaniya e Yeremot e Zabada e Aziza.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Zatu, nɛ́ Ɛlyɔnai, Eliasib, Matania, Yɛrɛmɔt, Zabad ká bá nɛ̀ Aziza.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Zatu, nɛ́ Ɛlyɔnai, Eliasib, Matania, Yɛrɛmɔt, Zabad ká bá nɛ̀ Aziza.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ŋwalea Zatəw: yɛ Ɛliyohɛnay, Ɛliyashib, Mataniya, Yerɛmot, Zabad le Aziza.
Tupurri: diñ Elyoenay, Eliyakib, Mataniya, Yeremod, Sabad wo de Asisa yoo jar ni Satu wo,

Francais: des fils de Bébaï : Johanan, Ananie, Zabbaï, Athalaï;
Anglais: Of the sons also of Bebai; Jehohanan, Hananiah, Zabbai, and Athlai.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Bebay si Yohanan, Hananiya, Zabbay hiɗi Atlay;
Bulu: ndaa Bebayi: Yôanañ, Anania, Zabayi a Atlayi;
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Bebayaya, i ti: Yohanaŋ, Hananiya, Zabay waɗ Atilay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Bebay: Yehohanan e Hananiya e Zabbay e Atalay.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Bebay: Yehohanan e Hananiya e Zabbay e Atalay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Bebai, nɛ́ Yohanaŋ, Hanania, Zabai ká bá nɛ̀ Atlai.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Bebai, nɛ́ Yohanaŋ, Hanania, Zabai ká bá nɛ̀ Atlai.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ŋwalea Bɛbay: yɛ Yohanan, Hananiya, Zabay le Atlay.
Tupurri: diñ Yohanan, Hananiya, Sabay wo de Atlay yoo jar ni Bebay wo,

Francais: des fils de Bani: Mosollam, Melluch, Adaïas, Jasub, Saal et Ramoth;
Anglais: And of the sons of Bani; Meshullam, Malluch, and Adaiah, Jashub, and Sheal, and Ramoth.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Bani si Mesullam, Malluk, Adaya, Yasub, Seyal hiɗi Ramot;
Bulu: nda Bani: Mesulam, Maluk, Adaya, Yasub, Séal a Ramôt;
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Baniheye, i ti: Mesulam, Maluk, Adaya, Yasup, Seyal waɗ Yeremot.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Baani: Mesullam e Malluku e Adaya e Yasuba e Seyal e Ramot.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Baani: Mesullam e Malluku e Adaya e Yasuba e Seyal e Ramot.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Bani, nɛ́ Mɛsulam, Maluk, Adaya, Yasub, Yisal, Yɛrɛmɔt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Bani, nɛ́ Mɛsulam, Maluk, Adaya, Yasub, Yisal, Yɛrɛmɔt.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ŋwalea Bani: yɛ Meshəwlam, Maləwk, Adaya, Yashəwb, Shɛyal le Yerɛmot.
Tupurri: diñ Mesulam, Malug, Adaya, Yakub, Seal wo de Ramod yoo jar ni Bani wo,

Francais: des fils de Phahath-Moab : Edna, Chalal, Banaïas, Maasias, Mathanias, Béséléel, Bennui et Manassé;
Anglais: And of the sons of Pahath–moab; Adna, and Chelal, Benaiah, Maaseiah, Mattaniah, Bezaleel, and Binnui, and Manasseh.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Pahat-Mowab si Adna, Kelal, Benaya, Maaseya, Mattaniya, Betsaleel, Binnuy hiɗi Manase;
Bulu: ndaa Payat-Môab: Adna, Kelal, Benaya, Maséya, Matania, Betsalil, Binuyi a Manasé.
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi pahat-Moˀapaya, i ti: Adina, Kelal, Benaya, Maˀaseya, Mataniya, Besalel, Binuwi waɗ Manase.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Pahat-Mo'ab: Adana e Kelal e Benaya e Ma'aseya e Mattaniya e Becaleel e Binnuy e Manassa.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Pahat-Mo'ab: Adana e Kelal e Benaya e Ma'aseya e Mattaniya e Becaleel e Binnuy e Manassa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Pahat-Mɔab, nɛ́ Adna, Kɛlal, Bɛnaya, Masɛya, Matania, Besalɛl, Binui ká bá nɛ̀ Manase.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Pahat-Mɔab, nɛ́ Adna, Kɛlal, Bɛnaya, Masɛya, Matania, Besalɛl, Binui ká bá nɛ̀ Manase.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ŋwalea Pahat-Mowab: yɛ Adna, Kelal, Benaya, Masɛya, Mataniya, Bɛsalɛl, Binəwi le Manasɛ.
Tupurri: diñ Adna, Kaelal, Benaya, Maaseya, Mataniya, Betsalel, Binuyi wo de Manase yoo jar ni Pahat-Mowab wo,

Francais: des fils de Harim : Eliézer, Jesias, Melchias, Séméïas,
Anglais: And of the sons of Harim; Eliezer, Ishijah, Malchijah, Shemaiah, Shimeon,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Harim si Eliyezer, Yisiya, Malkiya, Semayeya hiɗi Simeyon
Bulu: Ndaa Avim: Eliézer, Yisiya, Malkiya, Sémaéya, Siméoñ.
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Harimeye, i ti: Eliyezer, Isiya, Malkiya, Semaya, Simoŋ,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Harim: Eli'ezer e Yissiya e Malkiya e Sema'ya e Simeyon
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Harim: Eli'ezer e Yissiya e Malkiya e Sema'ya e Simeyon
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Harim, nɛ́ Eliɛzɛr, Isia, Malkia, Sɛmaya, Simɛɔŋ,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Harim, nɛ́ Eliɛzɛr, Isia, Malkia, Sɛmaya, Simɛɔŋ,
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ŋwalea Harim: yɛ Ɛliyɛzɛr, Isiya, Malkiya, Shemaya, Shimon,
Tupurri: diñ Eliyeser, Yisiya, Malkiya, Semaeya, Simeyoñ,

Francais: Siméon, Benjamin, Melluch, Samarias;
Anglais: Benjamin, Malluch, and Shemariah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Benyamin, Malluk, hiɗi Semariya;
Bulu: Ndaa Bényamin, Maluk, a Semaria a Siméon.
Guiziga: Benjameŋ, Maluk waɗ Semariya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Benyamin e Malluku e Semariya.
Fulfulde_DC: e Benyamin e Malluku e Semariya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛnjamin, Maluk ká bá nɛ̀ Sɛmaria.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛnjamin, Maluk ká bá nɛ̀ Sɛmaria.
Kapsiki_DC: Bɛnjamɛn, Maləwk le Shemariya.
Tupurri: Benjame, Malug wo de Semariya yoo jar ni Harim wo,

Francais: des fils de Hasom : Mathanaï, Mathatha, Zabad, Eliphélet, Jermaï, Manassé, Séméï;
Anglais: Of the sons of Hashum; Mattenai, Mattathah, Zabad, Eliphelet, Jeremai, Manasseh, and Shimei.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Haskum si Matnay, Matatta, Zabad, Elifelet, Yeremay, Manase hiɗi Simey;
Bulu: Ndaa Asum: Matanayi, Matata, Zabad, Elifélét, Yérémayi, Manasé, a Siméyi;
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Hasumoyo, i ti: Matenay, Matata, Zabat, Elifelet, Yeremay, Manase waɗ Simey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Hasum: Mattenay e Mattattay e Zabada e Elifelet e Yeremay e Manassa e Sim'i.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Hasum: Mattenay e Mattattay e Zabada e Elifelet e Yeremay e Manassa e Sim'i.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Hasum, nɛ́ Matɛnai, Matata, Zabad, Ɛlifɛlɛt, Yeremai in Manase ká bá nɛ̀ Simɛi.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Hasum, nɛ́ Matɛnai, Matata, Zabad, Ɛlifɛlɛt, Yeremai in Manase ká bá nɛ̀ Simɛi.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ŋwalea Hashəwm: yɛ Matenay, Matata, Zabad, Ɛlifɛlɛt, Yerɛmay, Manasɛ le Shimɛyi.
Tupurri: diñ Madnay, Matata, Sabad, Elifeled, Yeremay, Manase wo de Simeyi yoo jar ni Hasum wo.

Francais: des fils de Bani : Maaddi, Amram, Uel, Banaïas, Badaïas,
Anglais: Of the sons of Bani; Maadai, Amram, and Uel,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Bani, Maaday, Amram, Wel,
Bulu: ndaa Bani: Madayi, Amvam, Uél,
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Baniheye, i ti: Maˀaday, Amram, Uwel,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Baani: Ma'aday e Amram e Uyel
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Baani: Ma'aday e Amram e Uyel
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Bani, nɛ́ Madai, Amram, Uɛl,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Bani, nɛ́ Madai, Amram, Uɛl,
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ŋwalea Bani: yɛ Maday, Amram, Əwɛl,
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Bani wo diñ: Maaday, Amram, Uwel,

Francais: Chéliaü, Vanias,
Anglais: Benaiah, Bedeiah, Chelluh,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Benaya, Bediya, Keluhu,
Bulu: Benayi, Bédia, Keluyu,
Guiziga: Benaya, Bediya, Keluhu,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Benaya e Bediya e Keluhi
Fulfulde_DC: e Benaya e Bediya e Keluhi
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bɛnaya, Badia, Kɛluli,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bɛnaya, Badia, Kɛluli,
Kapsiki_DC: Benaya, Bɛdiya, Keləwhəw,
Tupurri: Benaya, Bediya, Keluhu,

Francais: Merimuth, Eliasib,
Anglais: Vaniah, Meremoth, Eliashib,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Vaniya, Meremot, Eliyasib,
Bulu: Vania, Mérémôt, Eliasib,
Guiziga: Vaniya, Meremot, Eliyasip,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Waniya e Meremot e Eliyasib
Fulfulde_DC: e Waniya e Meremot e Eliyasib
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Vania, Mɛrɛmɔt, Eliasib,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Vania, Mɛrɛmɔt, Eliasib,
Kapsiki_DC: Vaniya, Merɛmot, Ɛliyashib,
Tupurri: Faniya, Meremod, Eliyakib,

Francais: Mathanias, Mathanai, Jasi,
Anglais: Mattaniah, Mattenai, and Jaasau,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Mattaniya, Matnay, Yaasay;
Bulu: Matania, Matnayi, Yesayi:
Guiziga: Mataniya, Matenay, Yasay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Mattaniya e Mattenay e Ya'asay.
Fulfulde_DC: e Mattaniya e Mattenay e Ya'asay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Matania, Matɛnai, Yasai,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Matania, Matɛnai, Yasai,
Kapsiki_DC: Mataniya, Matenay, Yasay,
Tupurri: Mataniya, Madnay, Yaasay,

Francais: Bani, Bennui, Séméï,
Anglais: And Bani, and Binnui, Shimei,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Bani, Binnuy, Simey
Bulu: Bani, Binuyi, Siméyi,
Guiziga: Bani, Binuwi, Simey,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Binnuy: Sim'i
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Binnuy: Sim'i
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bani, Binui, Simɛi,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bani, Binui, Simɛi,
Kapsiki_DC: Bani, Binəwi, Shimɛyi,
Tupurri: Bani, Binuyi, Simeyi,

Francais: Salmias, Nathan, Adaïas,
Anglais: And Shelemiah, and Nathan, and Adaiah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Selemiya, Natan, Adaya,
Bulu: Sélémia, Natan, Adaya,
Guiziga: Selemiya, Nataŋ, Adaya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Selemiya e Natan e Adaya
Fulfulde_DC: e Selemiya e Natan e Adaya
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sɛlɛmia, Nataŋ, Adaya,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sɛlɛmia, Nataŋ, Adaya,
Kapsiki_DC: Shɛlɛmiya, Natan, Adaya,
Tupurri: Selemiya, Natañ, Adaya,

Francais: Mechnédébaï, Sisaï, Sarai,
Anglais: Machnadebai, Shashai, Sharai,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Maknadbay, Sasay, Saray,
Bulu: Maknadbayi, Sakayi, Sarayi.
Guiziga: Makenadebay, Sasay, Saray,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Makanadebay e Sasay e Saray
Fulfulde_DC: e Makanadebay e Sasay e Saray
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Maknadebai, Sasai, Sarai,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Maknadebai, Sasai, Sarai,
Kapsiki_DC: Maknadebay, Shashay, Sharay,
Tupurri: Maknadbay, Sasay, Saray,

Francais: Ezrel, Sélémiaü, Sémérias,
Anglais: Azareel, and Shelemiah, Shemariah,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Azareel, Selemiya, Semariya,
Bulu: Azaril, Sélémia, Semaria
Guiziga: Azarel, Selemiya, Semariya,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Azareyel e Selemiya e Semariya
Fulfulde_DC: e Azareyel e Selemiya e Semariya
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Azarɛl, Sɛlɛmia, Sɛmaria,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Azarɛl, Sɛlɛmia, Sɛmaria,
Kapsiki_DC: Azarɛl, Shɛlɛmiya, Shemariya,
Tupurri: Asareel, Selemiya, Semariya,

Francais: Sellum, Amarias, Joseph; des fils de Nébo :
Anglais: Shallum, Amariah, and Joseph.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sallum, Amariya hiɗi Yosef;
Bulu: Salum, Amaria a Yôsep;
Guiziga: Salum, Amariya waɗ Zozef.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e Sallum e Amariya e Yusufu.
Fulfulde_DC: e Sallum e Amariya e Yusufu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Salum, Amaria in Josɛf.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Salum, Amaria in Josɛf.
Kapsiki_DC: Shaləwm, Amariya le Zhozɛf.
Tupurri: Salum, Amariya wo de Josefe.

Francais: Jéhiel, Mathathias, Zabad, Zabina, Jeddu, Joël et Banaïas.
Anglais: Of the sons of Nebo; Jeiel, Mattithiah, Zabad, Zebina, Jadau, and Joel, Benaiah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: kuɗ jafna vi Nebo si Yeyel, Matitiya, Zabad, Zebina, Yadday, Yowel hiɗi Benaya.
Bulu: ndaa Nébô: Yeiél, Matitia, Zabad, Zebina, Yedayi, Yôél a Benaya.
Guiziga: A wuzla dideˀ ngi Nebohoyo, i ti: Yehiyel, Matitiya, Zabat, Zebina, Yaday, Zowel waɗ Benaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nder danygol Nebo: Ye'iyel e Mattitiya e Zabada e Zebina e Yadday e Yo'el e Benaya.
Fulfulde_DC: Nder danygol Nebo: Ye'iyel e Mattitiya e Zabada e Zebina e Yadday e Yo'el e Benaya.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Nɛbo, nɛ́ Yeiɛl, Matitia, Zabad, Zɛbina, Yadai, Jɔɛl ká bá nɛ̀ Bɛnaya.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o bezaŋ Nɛbo, nɛ́ Yeiɛl, Matitia, Zabad, Zɛbina, Yadai, Jɔɛl ká bá nɛ̀ Bɛnaya.
Kapsiki_DC: Hwa ŋwalea Nɛbo: yɛ Yɛyiyɛl, Matitiya, Zabad, Zɛbina, Yaday, Zhowɛl ba'a Benaya.
Tupurri: Yoo jar ni Nebo wo diñ: Yeiyel, Matitiya, Sabad, Sebina, Yaday, Jowel wo de Benaya.

Francais: Tous ces hommes avaient pris des femmes étrangères, et plusieurs d'entre eux en avaient eu des enfants.
Anglais: All these had taken strange wives: and some of them had wives by whom they had children.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kaf kayni yaw boyn sa pulla, segen ŋolo jarsiya vuɗ guro hiɗi nisi kaw.
Bulu: Balé bete bese be nga luʼu bengone bikuu a abui é nga biaé bon a be.
Guiziga: Mizli tayna gar na, a ɗuvam ngwasaya i ziri mulakay, yo hã mekelemey a wuzla taŋ a yam ziri le.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kamɓe fuu ɓe te'uno rewɓe jananɓe. Rewɓe woɗɓe ndanydino bee maɓɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Kamɓe fuu ɓe te'uno rewɓe jananɓe. Rewɓe woɗɓe ndanydino bee maɓɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ kaia so nɛ́ o ko-gɔni-duk, ɓɛɛ wa ndak wa in o bem kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wi nɔ‘i lɛŋ kaia so nɛ́ o ko-gɔni-duk, ɓɛɛ wa ndak wa in o bem kɔ-wa lɛŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Pɛtɛ mbeli nyighɛ kewəmeve mi hwa kweci hwelefefi, na kweci hwa mia shɛhɛ keyake ŋwale.
Tupurri: Jar sen wo mo äuy hay da wo maçyre dehaçyn wo, debañ yoo äaara hay biñ wo weere go de äaara.
